original: 'on te gang gis de ltar rnam par 'jog pa /
analyzed: 'on te gang gis de ltar rnam par 'jog pa /
translated: Or, is it that the eye consciousness and so on are definitely different because they are posited in that way?

original: mig la sogs pa'i shes pa la khyad par yod pa kho na'o snyam du dogs na snang ba nyid du zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: mig la sogs pa'i shes pa la khyad par yod pa kho na'o snyam du dogs na snang ba nyid du zhes gsungs so //
translated: If you think that, then he says, ‚Äúbecause of the appearance itself.‚Äù

original: rjes su 'gro ba dang zhes bya ba ni khyad par yod par dogs pa bsu ba'o //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba dang zhes bya ba ni khyad par yod par dogs pa bsu ba'o //
translated: ‚Äú Because of the conformity‚Äù is a response to the doubt that there is a difference.

original: ji ltar mthong zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar mthong zhe na /
translated: How is it seen?

original: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚Äú In this way‚Äù is the response.

original: sngar ni thob pa las so //
analyzed: sngar ni thob pa las so //
translated: Previously, it was from the obtainment.

original: rang dang gzhan gnyis kas kyang mngon gsum gyis ni mthong ba ma yin no zhes brjod pa ni rang nyid kyis zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang dang gzhan gnyis kas kyang mngon gsum gyis ni mthong ba ma yin no zhes brjod pa ni rang nyid kyis zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚Äú By oneself‚Äù is the statement that neither oneself nor the other sees it by means of direct perception.

original: rnam pa de lta bu'i snang ba ldog pa'i stobs las byung ba'i rjes su dpag pas so //
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bu'i snang ba ldog pa'i stobs las byung ba'i rjes su dpag pas so //
translated: It is by means of inference that arises from the power of the cessation of the appearance that is of that type.

original: mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa ni /
analyzed: mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa ni /
translated: The eye consciousness and so on

original: bshad pa'i khyad par gyi don dang ldan pa yin yang rmi lam gyi shes pa ni don med pa yin te /
analyzed: bshad pa'i khyad par gyi don dang ldan pa yin yang rmi lam gyi shes pa ni don med pa yin te /
translated: have the meaning of the explained difference, but the dream consciousness does not have an object.

original: gal te de lta na ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te de lta na ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If that is so, then he says, ‚Äúit follows that the eye consciousness and so on are not different.‚Äù

original: dmigs pa dang bcas pa la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba 'di ni tha snyad pa dang 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa yang yin no zhes brjod pa ni /
analyzed: dmigs pa dang bcas pa la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba 'di ni tha snyad pa dang 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa yang yin no zhes brjod pa ni /
translated: This classification of cognitions as having an object, etc. is not to be transcended by the conventional.

original: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Thus, it is said.

original: 'di la ni don med pa la zhes bya ba ni rmi lam gyi shes pa la ste don bya ba med pa'i phyir ro //üîΩ'on te yang gzhan gyi ltar na shes @71a * //
analyzed: 'di la ni don med pa la zhes bya ba ni rmi lam gyi shes pa la ste don bya ba med pa'i phyir ro // 'on te yang gzhan gyi ltar na shes @71a * //
translated: Here, ‚Äúin the absence of an object‚Äù refers to the cognition in a dream, because it does not perform a function.

original: pa thams cad dmigs pa dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir khyad par rtogs pa med do snyam na /
analyzed: pa thams cad dmigs pa dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir khyad par rtogs pa med do snyam na /
translated: But if, according to the other party, all cognitions have an object, then there is no realization of a difference.

original: 'di ltar zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes gsungs so //
translated: Thus, it is said.

original: 'di la ni rmi lam gyi shes pa la'o //
analyzed: 'di la ni rmi lam gyi shes pa la'o //
translated: Here, ‚Äúin a dream‚Äù refers to the cognition in a dream.

original: rmi lam du mthong ba 'di bag chags zhes sngon goms pa'i mthu las gang gis bdag la 'di ltar snang bar 'gyur ba yin no snyom pa'i blor 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: rmi lam du mthong ba 'di bag chags zhes sngon goms pa'i mthu las gang gis bdag la 'di ltar snang bar 'gyur ba yin no snyom pa'i blor 'gyur gyi /
translated: The thought occurs in a dream, ‚ÄúThis appearance of mine is due to the power of habituation to latent potentialities.‚Äù

original: sad pa'i rtog pa la ni de snyam du sems pa'i blor mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: sad pa'i rtog pa la ni de snyam du sems pa'i blor mi 'gyur te /
translated: But the thought does not occur in waking thought.

original: des na gzhan gyi ltar na yang rnam par dbye ba rtogs pa yod pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: des na gzhan gyi ltar na yang rnam par dbye ba rtogs pa yod pa kho na yin no //
translated: Therefore, even according to the opponent, the cognition of difference does exist.

original: blo gang zhig yod pa las 'dir dmigs pa dang bcas pa nyid du 'dod pa de ni med do zhes brjod pa ni sngon mthong ba de bdag gis mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i blo zhes bya ba ni skabs kyi yin no //
analyzed: blo gang zhig yod pa las 'dir dmigs pa dang bcas pa nyid du 'dod pa de ni med do zhes brjod pa ni sngon mthong ba de bdag gis mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i blo zhes bya ba ni skabs kyi yin no //
translated: The cognition that is accepted as the basis for the statement ‚ÄúIt exists‚Äù does not exist. The context is this: ‚ÄúThe cognition ‚ÄòI saw that which was seen before‚Äô is not a cognition of the present.‚Äù

original: bdag gis dran no zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: bdag gis dran no zhes bya ba'am /
translated: ‚ÄúI remember‚Äù is not a cognition.

original: don 'di ni 'jig rten pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni blo ni ma yin no //
analyzed: don 'di ni 'jig rten pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni blo ni ma yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúThis is not a worldly convention‚Äù is not a cognition.

original: 'on te de lta bu'i blo med kyang gnod par byed pas 'jig rten pa ma yin pa nyid du rtogs pa yin no snyam na /
analyzed: 'on te de lta bu'i blo med kyang gnod par byed pas 'jig rten pa ma yin pa nyid du rtogs pa yin no snyam na /
translated: If you think that even though such a cognition does not exist, it is understood to be non-worldly because it is contradicted,

original: gnod par byed pa gang gis zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gnod par byed pa gang gis zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then what is the contradiction?

original: 'on te don med pa nyid du thal ba'i phyir 'jig rten pa nyid du ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te don med pa nyid du thal ba'i phyir 'jig rten pa nyid du ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If you think that it is non-worldly because it is absurd for it to be worldly,

original: de ltar khas len na yang mi 'dod pa thog tu bab po zhes brjod pa ni de la zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de ltar khas len na yang mi 'dod pa thog tu bab po zhes brjod pa ni de la zhes bya ba ste /
translated: then even if you accept that, you have fallen into what is unacceptable.

original: gnod par byed pa la'o //
analyzed: gnod par byed pa la'o //
translated: In regard to the one who is harmed.

original: khyed ni phyin ci log tu snang bar smra ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: khyed ni phyin ci log tu snang bar smra ba yang ma yin te /
translated: You do not even advocate that the appearance is erroneous,

original: 'jig rten pa ma yin par smra ba khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //üîΩgal te yang gnod pa byed pa la //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa ma yin par smra ba khas blangs pa'i phyir ro // gal te yang gnod pa byed pa la //
translated: because you accept that it is not worldly.

original: phyin ci log gi snang bar khas len na gnod par bya ba yang de ltar ci ste khas mi len na /
analyzed: phyin ci log gi snang bar khas len na gnod par bya ba yang de ltar ci ste khas mi len na /
translated: Moreover, if you accept that the appearance is erroneous in regard to the one who is harmed, why do you not accept that the one who is harmed is also like that?

original: de yang sngar bsal zin pa yin no zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: de yang sngar bsal zin pa yin no zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: The thought is that this has already been refuted earlier.

original: de nyid kyi phyir phyin ci log snang ba las log par dogs pa bsu ba ni de yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir phyin ci log snang ba las log par dogs pa bsu ba ni de yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Therefore, anticipating the qualm that the appearance is erroneous, he says, ‚ÄúThat also . . . ‚Äù

original: rmi lam gyi shes pa 'ba' zhig 'jig rten pa yin par ni ma zad kyi /
analyzed: rmi lam gyi shes pa 'ba' zhig 'jig rten pa yin par ni ma zad kyi /
translated: Not only is the mere consciousness of a dream worldly,

original: 'jig rten pa yin pa las 'jig rten pa nyid rtogs pa gnod byed gang yin pa de yang 'jig rten pa ma yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa yin pa las 'jig rten pa nyid rtogs pa gnod byed gang yin pa de yang 'jig rten pa ma yin pa nyid do //
translated: but also that which is worldly is understood to be worldly. Whatever is harmful is also not worldly.

original: des na phyin ci log tu snang ba ni ma yin no zhen /
analyzed: des na phyin ci log tu snang ba ni ma yin no zhen /
translated: Therefore, the appearance is not erroneous.

original: lan ni ma yin te zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: lan ni ma yin te zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The response is ‚ÄúNo, because . . . ‚Äù

original: de yang 'jig rten pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: de yang 'jig rten pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: And that is not worldly.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: thug pa med par zhes bya ba'o //üîΩji ltar gnod pa byed pas 'jig rten pa ma yin pa la 'jig rten pa nyid du rtogs pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: thug pa med par zhes bya ba'o // ji ltar gnod pa byed pas 'jig rten pa ma yin pa la 'jig rten pa nyid du rtogs pa de bzhin du /
translated: Because there is an infinite regress.üîΩJust as the worldly person does not understand that the worldly person is not worldly because of being harmed,

original: gnod par byed pa yang gnod par byed pa gzhan gyis de lta bu nyid du rtogs pa ni de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gnod par byed pa yang gnod par byed pa gzhan gyis de lta bu nyid du rtogs pa ni de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
translated: so too the one who is harmed would understand that the one who is harmed is not worldly because of being harmed by another.

original: de bzhin du gnod pa gzhan yang yin pas thug pa med par @71b gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du gnod pa gzhan yang yin pas thug pa med par @71b gyur ro //
translated: And so too the one who is harmed by another. Thus there is an infinite regress.

original: mthar thug bar khas len pa ni gcig kyang 'jig rten ba nyid du mi 'grub bo zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: mthar thug bar khas len pa ni gcig kyang 'jig rten ba nyid du mi 'grub bo zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: The intention is that even if one accepts an end, it is not established that the worldly person is worldly.

original: de bas na gnod par byed pas 'jig rten pa ma yin pa nyid du rtogs pa ni don du mos pa med pa'i phyir don med pa nyid du rtogs pa ma yin no zhes bya ba nyid legs pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na gnod par byed pas 'jig rten pa ma yin pa nyid du rtogs pa ni don du mos pa med pa'i phyir don med pa nyid du rtogs pa ma yin no zhes bya ba nyid legs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is better to say that the understanding that the worldly person is not worldly because of being harmed is not the understanding that the worldly person is not worldly because of not being interested in the meaning.

original: ci ste yang gnod par byed pas ni 'jig rten pa ma yin pa nyid du rtogs pa ma yin na gang gis don med pa nyid du 'gyur /
analyzed: ci ste yang gnod par byed pas ni 'jig rten pa ma yin pa nyid du rtogs pa ma yin na gang gis don med pa nyid du 'gyur /
translated: But if you do not understand that the object is not of the world because it is harmed, then why is it useless?

original: 'on kyang thun mong ma yin pa nyid du yin no ba ni ci ste zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang thun mong ma yin pa nyid du yin no ba ni ci ste zhes bya ba'o //
translated: But if it is not shared, then why?

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: 'di zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ste /
translated: This means:

original: gang gi phyir rtogs pa ni med do zhes 'brel te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rtogs pa ni med do zhes 'brel te /
translated: because there is no understanding.

original: rtogs pa'i rnam pa brjod pa ni 'di gzhan gyis rtogs so snyam ba zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rtogs pa'i rnam pa brjod pa ni 'di gzhan gyis rtogs so snyam ba zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The expression of the form of understanding is ‚ÄúI understand this.‚Äù

original: rmi lam gyi shes pa 'di'o //
analyzed: rmi lam gyi shes pa 'di'o //
translated: The consciousness of a dream is this.

original: don la ni thun mong ma yin par rtogs pa yod pa yin te /
analyzed: don la ni thun mong ma yin par rtogs pa yod pa yin te /
translated: But there is understanding of the object as not shared,üîΩbecause there is inference of the opposite of that.

original: de las bzlog pa sgrub par rjes su dpag pa yod pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod pa ni don gyi yul la ni spu langs pa la sogs pa'i rtog pa can gyi rjes su dpag pas thun mong pa nyid du rtogs pa yin no ;üîΩ/ gang gi tshe zhe na /
analyzed: de las bzlog pa sgrub par rjes su dpag pa yod pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod pa ni don gyi yul la ni spu langs pa la sogs pa'i rtog pa can gyi rjes su dpag pas thun mong pa nyid du rtogs pa yin no ; / gang gi tshe zhe na /
translated: The expression of that is ‚ÄúThe object is understood as not shared, because of the inference of one who has the idea of horripilation, etc.‚ÄùüîΩWhen?

original: shes pa yod pa na'o //
analyzed: shes pa yod pa na'o //
translated: When consciousness exists.

original: sbu ldang pa la sogs pa gang yin pa des na de'i don can gyi shes pa yod pa na de ni de shes par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sbu ldang pa la sogs pa gang yin pa des na de'i don can gyi shes pa yod pa na de ni de shes par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Since there is the arising of the hairs, etc., when there is the cognition of the object of that, it is the producer of that cognition.

original: 'di lta na rmi lam gyi shes pa yang dmigs pa med par mi 'grub po zhes lan brjod pa ni de lta na ni 'on zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di lta na rmi lam gyi shes pa yang dmigs pa med par mi 'grub po zhes lan brjod pa ni de lta na ni 'on zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Thus, even the cognition in a dream is not established as being without an object.

original: gzhan gyi gnod byed kyi sgo nas don ma yin par rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes 'brel to //
analyzed: gzhan gyi gnod byed kyi sgo nas don ma yin par rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes 'brel to //
translated: The meaning of the rest of the passage is that the opponent‚Äôs objection is not valid.

original: rnam pa gang gis she na /
analyzed: rnam pa gang gis she na /
translated: In what way?

original: 'di la ni med kyi zhes smos so //
analyzed: 'di la ni med kyi zhes smos so //
translated: The passage says, ‚ÄúBut in this case . . .‚Äù

original: khyed kyi zhes bya ba ni rmi'am mthong ba'i'o //
analyzed: khyed kyi zhes bya ba ni rmi'am mthong ba'i'o //
translated: ‚ÄúYour‚Äù refers to the dream or the vision.

original: 'di la yang don bshad pa ni 'di ni rtogs pa nyid yin no zhes bya bar ro zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di la yang don bshad pa ni 'di ni rtogs pa nyid yin no zhes bya bar ro zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: The meaning of the passage is that the opponent‚Äôs objection is not valid.

original: bsam pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: bsam pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: The idea is this:

original: gal te 'di gzhan gyis ma rtogs so zhes rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gal te 'di gzhan gyis ma rtogs so zhes rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If the opponent thinks that the dream is not understood by others, then the dream is not understood by the opponent himself.

original: thun mong ma yin pa nyid yin na de'i tshe gnod par byed pa las don med do zhes rtogs pa las don ma yin par yang 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: thun mong ma yin pa nyid yin na de'i tshe gnod par byed pa las don med do zhes rtogs pa las don ma yin par yang 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is not common, then it is useless to refute it.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar shes pa thams cad dmigs pa dang bcas pa yin no zhes khyab pa grub pa de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar shes pa thams cad dmigs pa dang bcas pa yin no zhes khyab pa grub pa de'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is established that all cognitions are with an object.

original: ming dang mtshan ma 'chad pa po dang nyan pa po 'brel par khas len na ming la sogs pa snang ba gang yin pa der dmigs pa dang bcas par ni rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: ming dang mtshan ma 'chad pa po dang nyan pa po 'brel par khas len na ming la sogs pa snang ba gang yin pa der dmigs pa dang bcas par ni rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: If one accepts that the speaker and hearer are related to the name and sign, then it is not reasonable that they have an object in the appearance of the name, etc.

original: sgrub par byed pa med pa'i phyir dang gnod par byed pa gzung ba dmigs pa med pa nyid kyang yod pa'i phyir ro //üîΩ'brel pa @72a * //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa med pa'i phyir dang gnod par byed pa gzung ba dmigs pa med pa nyid kyang yod pa'i phyir ro // 'brel pa @72a * //
translated: Because there is no proof and because there is the apprehension of the non-existence of the object of refutation.

original: yod kyang brjod pa na 'jug par mi 'gyur na 'brel pa med pa smos su ci yod ces bshad pa ni 'brel pa med na yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yod kyang brjod pa na 'jug par mi 'gyur na 'brel pa med pa smos su ci yod ces bshad pa ni 'brel pa med na yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Even if there is a relation, if it does not engage when expressed, what need is there to mention that there is no relation?üîΩThis is because even without a relation, there is engagement.

original: gal te don dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa don dang 'brel par dogs pa bsu nas 'das pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa skyon brjod pa'o //
analyzed: gal te don dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa don dang 'brel par dogs pa bsu nas 'das pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa skyon brjod pa'o //
translated: If one thinks that the meaning is related, etc., anticipating a question, he says, the past, etc., expressing a fault.

original: don dang 'brel pa zhes bya ba ni don zhig na zhig pa yin pa des de ni brjod par bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: don dang 'brel pa zhes bya ba ni don zhig na zhig pa yin pa des de ni brjod par bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúrelated to the meaning‚Äù is that if the meaning is destroyed, the past is destroyed. Therefore, it is not to be expressed.

original: mi 'jug pa kho na ste zhes bya ba ni skyes bu dang sgra'o //
analyzed: mi 'jug pa kho na ste zhes bya ba ni skyes bu dang sgra'o //
translated: It is only non-engagement, i.e., the person and the sound.

original: 'di nyid bshad pa ni gang la don dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid bshad pa ni gang la don dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is explained: ‚ÄúWhere the meaning is related, etc.‚Äù

original: 'ba' zhig ni ming dang mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: 'ba' zhig ni ming dang mtshan ma'o //
translated: Only is name and sign.

original: gal te 'das pa la sogs pa'i don med kyang ming dang mtshan ma yod pa'i phyir na ji ltar mi 'jug par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gal te 'das pa la sogs pa'i don med kyang ming dang mtshan ma yod pa'i phyir na ji ltar mi 'jug par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If the meaning of the past, etc., does not exist, but name and sign do exist, how can there be non-engagement?

original: gal te zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: gal te zhes gsungs so //
translated: If one thinks, etc.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: don de rang gi mtshan nyid kyi rnam pa sgra las snang ba de med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don de rang gi mtshan nyid kyi rnam pa sgra las snang ba de med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the appearance of the meaning in the aspect of its own characteristic in the sound does not exist.

original: 'on te rnam pa med kyang de la 'jug go snyam na /
analyzed: 'on te rnam pa med kyang de la 'jug go snyam na /
translated: But if one thinks that even without the aspect, there is engagement,

original: gzhan rtog pas zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: gzhan rtog pas zhes gsungs so //

analyzed: de'i rang bzhin du lhag par zhen pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The word remainder refers to the universal, and the phrase by adherence to its nature means by adherence to the nature of the universal.üîΩIf you think that the word is applied to the object by superimposition of the universal, the root text states, The remainder....

analyzed: ming dang mtshan ma brjod pa la thal bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The word remainder refers to the universal, and the phrase by adherence to its nature means by adherence to the nature of the universal.üîΩIf you think that the word is applied to the object by superimposition of the universal, the root text states, The remainder....

original: mtshungs pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni ngo bo can la ltos pa'i phyir na de 'dzin pa nyid do //
analyzed: mtshungs pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni ngo bo can la ltos pa'i phyir na de 'dzin pa nyid do //
translated: The word remainder refers to the universal, and the phrase by adherence to its nature means by adherence to the nature of the universal.

original: des na de 'dzin pa las brjod pa'i nyes pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhes lan brjod pa ni /
analyzed: des na de 'dzin pa las brjod pa'i nyes pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhes lan brjod pa ni /
translated: If you think that the word is applied to the object by superimposition of the universal, the root text states, The remainder....

original: de min zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de min zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The word remainder refers to the universal,

original: ci ste mtshungs pa rnams kyang ngo bo zhes bya ba'i ni bshad pa tsam yin gyi /
analyzed: ci ste mtshungs pa rnams kyang ngo bo zhes bya ba'i ni bshad pa tsam yin gyi /
translated: But if you think that the so-called ‚Äúsameness‚Äù is merely a verbal description,

original: dngos po la ni yod pa'i spyi rang gi ngo bo yod pa nyid gsal ba rnams la 'jug pa yin gyi de'i rang bzhin don la ltos pa ni ma yin no snyam du dogs na /
analyzed: dngos po la ni yod pa'i spyi rang gi ngo bo yod pa nyid gsal ba rnams la 'jug pa yin gyi de'i rang bzhin don la ltos pa ni ma yin no snyam du dogs na /
translated: and that the universal that exists in things exists as the intrinsic reality of those things, and that it is the manifestation of those things, and that it is not dependent on the object,

original: 'dzin pa yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'dzin pa yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then the response is ‚ÄúEven the apprehension . . . .‚Äù

original: nam mkha' bzhin du rang rgyud par gzung yang gsal ba de dag gi spyi ma yin te gsal byed de dag gis gsal ba yang ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: nam mkha' bzhin du rang rgyud par gzung yang gsal ba de dag gi spyi ma yin te gsal byed de dag gis gsal ba yang ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Even if it is apprehended as autonomous like space, it is not the universal of those manifestations, nor is it the manifestation of those manifestations.

original: de lta yin na ci skyon snyam na /
analyzed: de lta yin na ci skyon snyam na /
translated: If that is so, what is the problem?

original: des na zhes gsungs te gsal ba la ltos pa med pa nyid na'o //
analyzed: des na zhes gsungs te gsal ba la ltos pa med pa nyid na'o //
translated: The response is ‚ÄúIn that case . . . .‚Äù If it does not depend on manifestation,

original: gsal ba yod pa dang med pa'i dus de gnyi gar dmigs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gsal ba yod pa dang med pa'i dus de gnyi gar dmigs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: it would be perceived both when the manifestation exists and when it does not exist.

original: gsal ba la mi ltos pa'i phyir 'ba' zhig tu ni @72b mdzad de rtag pa'i phyir yang rtag par dmigs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gsal ba la mi ltos pa'i phyir 'ba' zhig tu ni @72b mdzad de rtag pa'i phyir yang rtag par dmigs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Because it does not depend on manifestation, it would be perceived as permanent, because it is permanent.

original: 'on te yang ji ltar nam mkha' rtag pa yang mig la sogs pa la ltos nas mngon sum du gyur pa de bzhin du spyi yang gsal ba 'brel pas mngon par gsal ba la ltos nas mngon sum du 'gyur ro snyam pa ni /
analyzed: 'on te yang ji ltar nam mkha' rtag pa yang mig la sogs pa la ltos nas mngon sum du gyur pa de bzhin du spyi yang gsal ba 'brel pas mngon par gsal ba la ltos nas mngon sum du 'gyur ro snyam pa ni /
translated: But if you think that just as space, though permanent, becomes evident in dependence on the eye, etc., so too the universal becomes evident in dependence on the manifestation of the particular,

original: gal te yang gsal ba ste khyad par las spyi mngon sum la gsal bar 'gyur ba yin te /üîΩgsal ba gsal ba nyid spyi mngon sum du gyur pa'i rgyu mtshan no zhes bya ba yin gyi /
analyzed: gal te yang gsal ba ste khyad par las spyi mngon sum la gsal bar 'gyur ba yin te / gsal ba gsal ba nyid spyi mngon sum du gyur pa'i rgyu mtshan no zhes bya ba yin gyi /
translated: then, although the universal is evident in dependence on the particular,üîΩthe particular is not evident in dependence on the universal.

original: gsal ba'i thad nas mngon sum du gsal ba yin no zhes bya ba ni 'thad par dka' ste /
analyzed: gsal ba'i thad nas mngon sum du gsal ba yin no zhes bya ba ni 'thad par dka' ste /
translated: It is not tenable to say that the particular is evident in dependence on the universal.

original: mngon sum dang gsal ba dag khyad med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mngon sum dang gsal ba dag khyad med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no difference between the particular and the universal.

original: gal te spyi'am nam mkha' mngon sum gyi rang bzhin yin na ni gsal bar byed pa la ltos pa ma yin te don med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gal te spyi'am nam mkha' mngon sum gyi rang bzhin yin na ni gsal bar byed pa la ltos pa ma yin te don med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If the universal or space were the nature of direct perception, it would not depend on manifestation, because that would be pointless.

original: de'i rang bzhin gsal bar byed pa la ltos pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin gsal bar byed pa la ltos pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not that its nature depends on manifestation.

original: khyad par du byar med pa'i phyir ro zhes lan 'debs pa ni bdag la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: khyad par du byar med pa'i phyir ro zhes lan 'debs pa ni bdag la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The reply is ‚Äúbecause there is no difference.‚Äù

original: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni gsal bar mthar thug pa'i rang bzhin du'o //
analyzed: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni gsal bar mthar thug pa'i rang bzhin du'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOtherwise‚Äù means that it would be the nature of the manifest that is final.

original: ci'i phyir 'das pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs par mi 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir 'das pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs par mi 'gyur zhe na /
translated: Why would it not be understood as the nature of the past, etc.?

original: spyi ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: spyi ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe universal‚Äù is the reply.

original: gzhan du zhes bya ba ste brjod pa ni gal te spyi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan du zhes bya ba ste brjod pa ni gal te spyi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOtherwise‚Äù means that if it is said that the universal is the nature of the past, etc.,

original: de lta yin na zhes bya ba ni 'das pa la sogs pa'i gsal ba dang ldan pas de ltar lhag par zhen pa yin na'o //
analyzed: de lta yin na zhes bya ba ni 'das pa la sogs pa'i gsal ba dang ldan pas de ltar lhag par zhen pa yin na'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIn that case‚Äù means that it would be the universal that is conceived as such because it possesses the manifest of the past, etc.

original: de ltar gyur pa la rag go zhe na gsal ba zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de ltar gyur pa la rag go zhe na gsal ba zhes gsungs so //
translated: If that is the case, then what is the use of the manifest?

original: de med kyang de'i sgo nas de ltar rtogs par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de med kyang de'i sgo nas de ltar rtogs par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If it is thought that it is not understood in that way even though it does not exist,üîΩthen the reply is ‚Äúbecause it is not understood in that way even though it does not exist.‚Äù

original: gang gi phyir 'das pa la sogs pa de'i rang bzhin yul du byas pa gang la yod pa'i khra bo la sogs pa de ni gzhan spyi la sogs pa de'i rang bzhin des nye bar rgyu ba nyid du 'dzin par mi nus so ;
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'das pa la sogs pa de'i rang bzhin yul du byas pa gang la yod pa'i khra bo la sogs pa de ni gzhan spyi la sogs pa de'i rang bzhin des nye bar rgyu ba nyid du 'dzin par mi nus so ;
translated: Because the variegated, etc., which have as their object the nature of the past, etc., cannot be apprehended as the universal, etc., which is the nature of something else, and which is not engaged with that.

original: / des na de med pa ni de'i sgo nas rtogs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: / des na de med pa ni de'i sgo nas rtogs pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the nonexistence of that is not understood by means of that.

original: 'dzin na yang zhes bya ba 'chad pa ni ci ste zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'dzin na yang zhes bya ba 'chad pa ni ci ste zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The explanation of ‚Äúif it were apprehended‚Äù is ‚Äúif it were.‚Äù

original: de'i zhes bya ba ni gsal ba'i rang bzhin gyi'o //
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba ni gsal ba'i rang bzhin gyi'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the nature of the manifest.

original: de gang las she na de med par zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de gang las she na de med par zhes bya ba'o //
translated: From what? ‚ÄúFrom the nonexistence of that.‚Äù

original: gsal ba shes pa med par ro //
analyzed: gsal ba shes pa med par ro //
translated: From the nonexistence of the cognition of the manifest.

original: ci'i phyir des gsal bar byed pa ma yin snyam du dogs na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir des gsal bar byed pa ma yin snyam du dogs na /
translated: If you think, ‚ÄúWhy doesn‚Äôt it manifest that?‚Äù

original: de'i rang bzhin ni gsal bar byed pa'i rang bzhin la ltos pas de med na mi 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i don du gsal pa'i rang bzhin brjod pa ni /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin ni gsal bar byed pa'i rang bzhin la ltos pas de med na mi 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i don du gsal pa'i rang bzhin brjod pa ni /
translated: To demonstrate that the nature of that is dependent on the nature of manifestation, and that without that, it would not exist, the nature of the manifest is stated:

original: sgron ma la sogs pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sgron ma la sogs pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚Äúthe nature of the lamp, etc.‚Äù

original: des na zhes bya ba ni gsal bas gsal bar bya ba ma yin pas so //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni gsal bas gsal bar bya ba ma yin pas so //
translated: Therefore, because the manifest is not manifested by the manifest.

original: 'di nyid gsal bar byed @73a * //
analyzed: 'di nyid gsal bar byed @73a * //
translated: This is clarified:

original: pa ni gsal bas stong pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: pa ni gsal bas stong pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: by the manifest, by the empty.üîΩFor example,

original: dper na zhes bya ba ni dper 'god ba'o //
analyzed: dper na zhes bya ba ni dper 'god ba'o //
translated: is an example.

original: gal te yang /üîΩgsal las mngon sum la gsal yin //
analyzed: gal te yang / gsal las mngon sum la gsal yin //
translated: If,üîΩthe manifest is manifested by the manifest,

original: zhes bya ba 'chad pa ni 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'chad pa ni 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: is an explanation.üîΩThere is no fault,

original: skyon med do zhes bya ba ni rtag tu dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: skyon med do zhes bya ba ni rtag tu dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: the characteristic of always being apprehended.üîΩHere, first, the example is not similar to itself,

original: 'di la re zhig rang nyid kyis rang dpe mi mthun par byed pa ni de ni mi rigs te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di la re zhig rang nyid kyis rang dpe mi mthun par byed pa ni de ni mi rigs te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: that is not reasonable.

original: de nyid ni spyi'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni spyi'o //
translated: That itself is the general.

original: ci'i phyir dpe ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir dpe ma yin zhe na /
translated: Why is it not an example?üîΩIt is said,

original: spyi ni zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: spyi ni zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: the general.

original: ci'i phyir phyogs nyid dpe ma yin snyam na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir phyogs nyid dpe ma yin snyam na /
translated: Why is the very position not an example?

original: phyogs nyid ni zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: phyogs nyid ni zhes gsungs so //
translated: The very position is said.

original: gsal ba dang ma 'brel na gsal ba nyid la rtogs par ji ltar 'gyur te /
analyzed: gsal ba dang ma 'brel na gsal ba nyid la rtogs par ji ltar 'gyur te /
translated: If it is not related to the manifest, how can it be understood in the manifest itself?

original: gzhan du yang rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa'i yul yin no //
analyzed: gzhan du yang rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa'i yul yin no //
translated: The phrase or else, it would be understood elsewhere is the subject of dispute.

original: de lta na ni bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed ma grub pa la sogs pa dag dpe ma yin par 'gyur ro zhes brjod pa ni dpe'i skyon med bar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de lta na ni bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed ma grub pa la sogs pa dag dpe ma yin par 'gyur ro zhes brjod pa ni dpe'i skyon med bar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If that were so, then the examples of unproven probandum and probans and so on would not be examples. The phrase there is no fault in the example is the statement of this.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar spyi dpe ma yin pa des na'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar spyi dpe ma yin pa des na'o //
translated: Because of that, the general is not an example. The phrase because of that means because of that.

original: de la ni spyi la'o //
analyzed: de la ni spyi la'o //
translated: The phrase in that means in that general.

original: mngon sum gyi rtogs pas zhes bya ba ni gsal ba'i yul du zhes kha bskangs te /
analyzed: mngon sum gyi rtogs pas zhes bya ba ni gsal ba'i yul du zhes kha bskangs te /
translated: The phrase by the understanding of perception is to be supplemented with the words in the object of the particular.

original: thams cad du sgra kho na las spyi rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //üîΩmngon sum gyis gzung na ba rda med pa'i phyir sgra las rtogs par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: thams cad du sgra kho na las spyi rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to // mngon sum gyis gzung na ba rda med pa'i phyir sgra las rtogs par mi 'gyur te /
translated: The meaning is that everywhere the general is understood only from the word.

original: des na mngon sum gyis 'dzin pa yin no zhes dogs pa bsu ba ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: des na mngon sum gyis 'dzin pa yin no zhes dogs pa bsu ba ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is grasped by perception, it would not be understood from the word, because there is no connection. The phrase it is grasped by perception is the anticipation of an objection.

original: sgra nyid las 'brel pa 'dzin na ni thug pa med par 'gyur ro snyam du bsams pa'o //
analyzed: sgra nyid las 'brel pa 'dzin na ni thug pa med par 'gyur ro snyam du bsams pa'o //
translated: If the connection is grasped from the word itself, there would be an infinite regress. This is the thought.

original: mngon sum gyis rtogs pa nyid ni sgra las rtogs pa ma yin te tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mngon sum gyis rtogs pa nyid ni sgra las rtogs pa ma yin te tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not understood from the word itself, because it is different.

original: des na de ltar de mngon sum gyis 'dzin zhes lan gdab pa'i phyir rnam par rtog par byed pa ni spyi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: des na de ltar de mngon sum gyis 'dzin zhes lan gdab pa'i phyir rnam par rtog par byed pa ni spyi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Therefore, in order to respond that it is apprehended in that way by perception, the conceptual thought is called a universal.

original: dang po la brjod pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dang po la brjod pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The first is stated with ‚Äúif.

original: de nyid ni sgra rtogs pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni sgra rtogs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: ‚Äù That itself is what is understood from the word.

original: shes pa la ltos te brjod nas don la ltos nas brjod pa ni rang bzhin nyid kyis zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: shes pa la ltos te brjod nas don la ltos nas brjod pa ni rang bzhin nyid kyis zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Having stated it in dependence on consciousness, it is stated in dependence on the object with ‚Äúby nature.

original: sgras nye bar bstan pas so //
analyzed: sgras nye bar bstan pas so //
translated: ‚Äù It is indicated by the word.

original: 'on te zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa la brjod pa'o ;
analyzed: 'on te zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa la brjod pa'o ;
translated: ‚ÄúOr‚Äù refers to the second.

original: / de la ni mngon sum gyis mthong ba la'o //
analyzed: / de la ni mngon sum gyis mthong ba la'o //
translated: There, it is seen by perception.

original: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni brda'i yul ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni brda'i yul ma yin pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúOtherwise‚Äù is not the object of the convention.

original: rnam pa mi gsal bar ro //
analyzed: rnam pa mi gsal bar ro //
translated: It is unclear.

original: 'on te de nyid sgra las de ltar snang ba yin no snyam na /
analyzed: 'on te de nyid sgra las de ltar snang ba yin no snyam na /
translated: If it is thought that it appears in that way from the word itself,

original: sgra'i shes pa la yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sgra'i shes pa la yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then it is also in the consciousness of the word.

original: mngon sum gyis rtogs pa'i rang bzhin kho nar zhes bya ba ni rang @73b bzhin gyis ma yin te /
analyzed: mngon sum gyis rtogs pa'i rang bzhin kho nar zhes bya ba ni rang @73b bzhin gyis ma yin te /
translated: ‚ÄúOnly the nature that is perceived‚Äù means not by way of its own nature,

original: gcig la rang bzhin gnyis mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gcig la rang bzhin gnyis mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because two natures are not possible for a single thing.

original: 'o na rang bzhin gcig nyid kyang shes pa gzhan la rnam pa gzhan du snang ba yin no snyam na /
analyzed: 'o na rang bzhin gcig nyid kyang shes pa gzhan la rnam pa gzhan du snang ba yin no snyam na /
translated: If you think that even though it is a single nature, it appears in another aspect to another cognition,

original: sgra'i rang bzhin ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sgra'i rang bzhin ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then it is said, ‚ÄúThe nature of sound.‚Äù

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: spyi ni zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: spyi ni zhes gsungs so //
translated: It is said, ‚ÄúBecause the universal.‚Äù

original: de'i rang bzhin nyid mngon sum gyis rtogs pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin nyid mngon sum gyis rtogs pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: That very nature is the nature that is perceived.

original: des na shes pa gzhan la rnam pa gzhan du snang ba ma yin no zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: des na shes pa gzhan la rnam pa gzhan du snang ba ma yin no zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it is the intention that it does not appear in another aspect to another cognition.

original: thal ba 'di 'ba' zhig tu yang ma zad de /
analyzed: thal ba 'di 'ba' zhig tu yang ma zad de /
translated: Not only is this consequence,

original: thams cad tshe yang snang bar 'gyur ro //üîΩde ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: thams cad tshe yang snang bar 'gyur ro // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: but it would also follow that everything would always appear.üîΩWhy is that?

original: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is said, ‚ÄúBecause of that.‚Äù

original: ci mi dmigs par bya ba'i rang bzhin la rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: ci mi dmigs par bya ba'i rang bzhin la rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: The nature of the object of non-observation does not change into another aspect.

original: gzhan gyis rnam pa gzhan du byed na ni mi rtag pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gzhan gyis rnam pa gzhan du byed na ni mi rtag pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: If others make it otherwise, it would be impermanent.

original: sngon po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin mtshan nyid dmigs pa na skye bo la thogs pa med pa'i bag chags kyis bskyed pa sngon po la sogs pa mi gsal bar snang ba'i shes pa skye la de'i snang ba la phyi rol nyid du lhag par zhen pas /
analyzed: sngon po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin mtshan nyid dmigs pa na skye bo la thogs pa med pa'i bag chags kyis bskyed pa sngon po la sogs pa mi gsal bar snang ba'i shes pa skye la de'i snang ba la phyi rol nyid du lhag par zhen pas /
translated: When the nature or characteristic of blue, etc., is perceived, a cognition arises in the person that is generated by the latent impressions of the non-obstruction of blue, etc., appearing unclearly as blue, etc. Due to the superimposition of external reality onto that appearance,

original: de la mngon par rtogs pas ci zhig bya zhes gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: de la mngon par rtogs pas ci zhig bya zhes gsungs pa ni /
translated: what is the use of realizing that?

original: de la'ang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de la'ang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Also means

analyzed: spyi'i rnam par shes pa la sgra las byung ba las su gyur pa'o //
translated: in the general cognition, it is the object arisen from sound.

original: rjes 'brel ni rjes su zhugs pa ste /
analyzed: rjes 'brel ni rjes su zhugs pa ste /
translated: Connection means engagement.

original: sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pa'i cha mi gsal ba'o //
analyzed: sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pa'i cha mi gsal ba'o //
translated: It is the unclear aspect of the form of blue, etc.

original: gang gis sprul zhes bya ba ni spyi sa ma yin la /
analyzed: gang gis sprul zhes bya ba ni spyi sa ma yin la /
translated: By whom is it emanated? means it is not by the universal,

original: bsal bas kyang ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: bsal bas kyang ma yin pa ste /
translated: nor by the particular.

original: gnyi ga la yang de 'dra ba'i rnam pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyi ga la yang de 'dra ba'i rnam pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because in both cases, there is no such form.

original: de nyid kyang spyi ma yin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyang spyi ma yin te /
translated: That is not a universal,

original: de ni rnam pa med pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni rnam pa med pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is without aspects.

original: rnam 'grel dang po ni ma bkral te gsal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam 'grel dang po ni ma bkral te gsal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The first commentary is not explained, because it is clear.

original: gnyis pa 'chad pa ni gsal te sgra las zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa 'chad pa ni gsal te sgra las zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The second explanation is clear: ‚Äúfrom the word.‚Äù

original: de'i tshe spyi'i rnam pa 'ba' zhig tu ste gsal ba'i rang bzhin dang 'brel par ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe spyi'i rnam pa 'ba' zhig tu ste gsal ba'i rang bzhin dang 'brel par ro //
translated: At that time, it is only the aspect of the universal, connected with the nature of the individual.

original: gsal ba las yin par srid pa'i dogs pa bsu nas sel ba ni gsal ba las zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gsal ba las yin par srid pa'i dogs pa bsu nas sel ba ni gsal ba las zhes bya ba'o //
translated: In order to anticipate and resolve the doubt that it is from the individual, it says ‚Äúfrom the individual.‚Äù

original: gang las zhes bya ba ni gsal ba'i rnam pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gang las zhes bya ba ni gsal ba'i rnam pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúFrom what?‚Äù means ‚Äúnot from the aspect of the individual.‚Äù

original: des bskyed pa'i phyir te de'i yin no zhe na gsal bas bskyed pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: des bskyed pa'i phyir te de'i yin no zhe na gsal bas bskyed pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs so //
translated: Because it is produced from that, it is of that. If it is said that it is because it is produced from the individual, it is said that it is because it is produced from the individual.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: spyi med par zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: spyi med par zhes gsungs so //
translated: It says ‚Äúbecause there is no universal.‚Äù

original: ji lta zhe na /üîΩde las tha dad par zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na / de las tha dad par zhes gsungs te /
translated: How is that?üîΩIt says ‚Äúbecause it is different from that.‚Äù

original: sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pa las tha dad par ro //
analyzed: sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pa las tha dad par ro //
translated: It is different from the aspect of blue and so on.

original: rjes su song ba'i rnam pa ni snang ba nyid yin la /
analyzed: rjes su song ba'i rnam pa ni snang ba nyid yin la /
translated: The aspect that is in accordance with that is the appearance itself.

original: spyi yang @74a * //
analyzed: spyi yang @74a * //
translated: And that is the universal.

original: de nyid yin no snyam na rjes su song ba'i zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de nyid yin no snyam na rjes su song ba'i zhes gsungs so //
translated: If you think that, then the text says, ‚Äúin accordance with that.‚ÄùüîΩEven if you assert that the aspect of blue, etc., is a non-distinct universal aspect, the meaning of those words is not so.

original: sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pa mi gsal ba'i spyi'i rnam pa nyid 'dod na yang don de rnams kyis mi 'gyur ro zhes brjod pa ni de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //üîΩsgra las sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pa gnas pa'i spyi dang don gnyis ka rtogs pa'i phyir te don rnams kyis spyi yin no snyam du dogs pa bsu ba ni /
analyzed: sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pa mi gsal ba'i spyi'i rnam pa nyid 'dod na yang don de rnams kyis mi 'gyur ro zhes brjod pa ni de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o // sgra las sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pa gnas pa'i spyi dang don gnyis ka rtogs pa'i phyir te don rnams kyis spyi yin no snyam du dogs pa bsu ba ni /
translated: The words ‚Äúbecause of that‚Äù are stated.üîΩBecause of the words, both the universal and the object are understood as the aspect of blue, etc.

original: gnyig yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gnyig yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The words ‚Äúboth of those‚Äù anticipate an objection that the universal is the object.

original: lan ni dbang pos gzung bar bya ba nyid du mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan ni dbang pos gzung bar bya ba nyid du mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response is, ‚ÄúIt would not be apprehended by the sense faculties.‚Äù

original: sgra las byung ba kho nas gnyi ga rtogs na dbang po don med pa'i phyir dbang pos gzung ba nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgra las byung ba kho nas gnyi ga rtogs na dbang po don med pa'i phyir dbang pos gzung ba nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If both were understood only from the words, then because the sense faculties would be useless, it would not be apprehended by the sense faculties.

original: 'on te sgra las 'byung bas mi gnyi ga 'dzin la dbang pos ni khyad par tsam 'dzin pa des na dbang po 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on te sgra las 'byung bas mi gnyi ga 'dzin la dbang pos ni khyad par tsam 'dzin pa des na dbang po 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin no //
translated: Or, if it is from the word, then both are apprehended by the sense faculty, but the sense faculty apprehends only the particular. Therefore, the sense faculty has a result.

original: brjod pa ni dbang po zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: brjod pa ni dbang po zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement the sense faculty is the subject.

original: dbang po'i gzung ba zhes bya ba ni khyad par tsam zhes bya ba lhag ma yin no //
analyzed: dbang po'i gzung ba zhes bya ba ni khyad par tsam zhes bya ba lhag ma yin no //
translated: The statement the sense faculty's object is the predicate. The remainder is the reason, only the particular.

original: 'di ji ltar mi rigs snyam na /
analyzed: 'di ji ltar mi rigs snyam na /
translated: How is this unreasonable?

original: spyi dbang pos ma bzung na brda med par 'gyur ba'i phyir te /üîΩsgras rigs pa ma yin no zhes brjod /
analyzed: spyi dbang pos ma bzung na brda med par 'gyur ba'i phyir te / sgras rigs pa ma yin no zhes brjod /
translated: If the universal is not apprehended by the sense faculty, there would be no convention.üîΩIt is said, It is not reasonable from the word.

original: lan brjod pa ni sgra la ltos pa ma yin no //
analyzed: lan brjod pa ni sgra la ltos pa ma yin no //
translated: The answer is, it does not depend on the word.

original: gal te sgra las rtogs pa yod pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te sgra las rtogs pa yod pa nyid ma yin nam /

original: des na mi 'gyur ro zhes ji ste brjod ce na /
analyzed: des na mi 'gyur ro zhes ji ste brjod ce na /
translated: Then why is it said, It does not occur that way?

original: gang gi phyir sgra las ni mngon sum gyis gzung ba'i spyi yod do zhes rtogs pas ni med do //
analyzed: gang gi phyir sgra las ni mngon sum gyis gzung ba'i spyi yod do zhes rtogs pas ni med do //
translated: Because from the word, there is no understanding that the universal exists, which is apprehended by perception.

original: ci'i phyir de lta bu rtogs pa med snyam na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir de lta bu rtogs pa med snyam na /
translated: Why is there no such understanding?

original: yid ches pa zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: yid ches pa zhes gsungs so //
translated: It is said, Because of confidence.

original: ji ltar mngon sum las ba lang 'di ni ba lang ngo zhes yid ches pa skye ba de bzhin du sgra las ni yid ches pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ji ltar mngon sum las ba lang 'di ni ba lang ngo zhes yid ches pa skye ba de bzhin du sgra las ni yid ches pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Just as, in the case of perception, the cognition that ‚Äòthis is a cow‚Äô is certain, so in the case of verbal cognition, there is no such certainty.

original: yang na ma yin te zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa dgag pa'o //
analyzed: yang na ma yin te zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa dgag pa'o //
translated: Or, it may not be so; this is the denial of the objection.

original: gsal ba bzhin du spyi yang dbang pos gzung bar bya ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gsal ba bzhin du spyi yang dbang pos gzung bar bya ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: The Universal would be perceptible by the senses, just like the Individual.

original: 'on te dbang pos gsal ba rtogs pa na spyi mi 'dzin pa nyid do zhe na /üîΩdbang pos zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te dbang pos gsal ba rtogs pa na spyi mi 'dzin pa nyid do zhe na / dbang pos zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If, when the Individual is apprehended by the senses, the Universal is not apprehended, then the Universal would not be perceptible by the senses.üîΩ‚ÄòBy the senses‚Äô is to be construed with ‚Äòapprehended‚Äô.

original: dbang pos bzung ba zhes bya ba la spyi zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
analyzed: dbang pos bzung ba zhes bya ba la spyi zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //

original: lhag ma ni bshad pa snga ma dang mthun no //
analyzed: lhag ma ni bshad pa snga ma dang mthun no //
translated: The rest is as before.

original: 'di las kyang de ltar rtogs pa ma yin no zhes brjod pa ni snang ba tha dad pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di las kyang de ltar rtogs pa ma yin no zhes brjod pa ni snang ba tha dad pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The assertion that ‚Äòit is not apprehended in this way‚Äô is in the words ‚Äòbecause there is difference in the appearance‚Äô.

original: de'i phyir spyi sgra las ni rtogs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir spyi sgra las ni rtogs pa ma yin no //

original: gang gi phyir sgra las byung ba'i shes pa la sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pa'i cha 'ba' zhig snang la gzhan ni 'ga' yang ma yin pa de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir sgra las byung ba'i shes pa la sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pa'i cha 'ba' zhig snang la gzhan ni 'ga' yang ma yin pa de'i phyir ro //
translated: Because only the aspect of the form of blue, etc. appears in the cognition that arises from sound, and nothing else at all.

original: des na dbang po don med pa ni so na 'dug go zhes thal ba'i @74b don nye bar sdud pa ni des na gsal ba nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: des na dbang po don med pa ni so na 'dug go zhes thal ba'i @74b don nye bar sdud pa ni des na gsal ba nyid ces bya ba'o //

original: sngon po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin spyir smra ba nyid /
analyzed: sngon po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin spyir smra ba nyid /

original: gsal ba dang mi gsal ba sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba dbang bo dang sgra las skyes pa'i shes pa dag gi yul rnam par 'jog pa'i phyir na dbang po don med par 'gyur ro zhes brjod pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //

translated: The distinction between the manifestation and the non-manifestation of blue, etc. is established as the object of the cognitions that arise from the sense faculties and from sound. Therefore, the sense faculties are useless. This is stated in the words ‚ÄúIf, however, . . . ‚Äù

original: mngon sum shes don nyid phyir na //üîΩzhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mngon sum shes don nyid phyir na // zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because it is the object of direct perception.üîΩThis is stated in the words ‚ÄúBecause it is the object of direct perception. . . .‚Äù

original: gsal ba'i shes pa'i don yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsal ba'i shes pa'i don yin pa'i phyir ro //

original: 'di la lan ni de dngos shes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di la lan ni de dngos shes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The response to this is ‚ÄúThat is known by the cognition, etc. . . . ‚Äù

original: sgra dang gzugs dang ro la sogs pa dngos po gcig las gsal ba dang mi gsal ba ga las yin te /
analyzed: sgra dang gzugs dang ro la sogs pa dngos po gcig las gsal ba dang mi gsal ba ga las yin te /
translated: How could there be clarity and unclarity in one thing, such as sound, form, taste, etc.?

analyzed: mngon sum gyis rtogs pa rnam par mtshungs pa kho nar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it would be just the same in terms of being understood by direct perception.

analyzed: gang zhig sgra las byung ba la yod pa'i phyir dbang po rnams 'bras bu med par 'gyur ba mngon sum nyid de /
translated: If it were due to the existence of sound, the senses would be fruitless, because direct perception itself

original: ci 'dra ba zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci 'dra ba zhig yin zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: mngon sum nyid ni zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: mngon sum nyid ni zhes gsungs so //

original: de yod na zhes bya ba ni sgra las 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: de yod na zhes bya ba ni sgra las 'byung ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIf it exists‚Äù means if it arises from sound.

analyzed: gzhan dag rnam pa gzhan du mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid brjod pa ni /
translated: Others state the definition of direct perception in a different way:

analyzed: mdun na gnas pa nyid du zhes bya ba'o //

analyzed: de lta bu'i rtogs pa ni sgra las 'gyur ba ma yin pas na dbang po rnams don med par mi 'gyur ro zhes bsams pa'o //

original: ma yin pa ste zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa'o //
analyzed: ma yin pa ste zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIt is not‚Äù means it is refuted.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: sgra ni rnam pa gzhan du zhes smos te /
analyzed: sgra ni rnam pa gzhan du zhes smos te /
translated: Sound is different in kind,

original: mdun na mi gnas pa nyid do //
analyzed: mdun na mi gnas pa nyid do //
translated: it does not exist in front.

analyzed: mtshan nyid 'di la ni ma khyab pa'i nyes pa yod do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that this characteristic is not universal.üîΩAs it was said, ‚ÄúIt is the very understanding of the nature of the object,‚Äù

original: ji skad du don gyi rang gi ngo bo rtogs pa kho na zhes brjod pa de nyid rnam pa gzhan mi srid pa nyid kyis tshig gzhan gyi sgo nas dogs pa bsu ba ni /
analyzed: ji skad du don gyi rang gi ngo bo rtogs pa kho na zhes brjod pa de nyid rnam pa gzhan mi srid pa nyid kyis tshig gzhan gyi sgo nas dogs pa bsu ba ni /
translated: the author anticipates an objection from another point of view, namely,

analyzed: bdag nyid thams cad ces bya ba'o //

original: de lta na yang snga ma bzhin du dbang po 'bras bu med par 'gyur ro zhes lan 'debs pa ni sgra las kyang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de lta na yang snga ma bzhin du dbang po 'bras bu med par 'gyur ro zhes lan 'debs pa ni sgra las kyang zhes bya ba'o //

analyzed: de nyid ni dbang po las rtogs pa gang yin pa nyid de de nyid la ni dbang pos rtogs par bya ba la'o //

analyzed: des na dbang po rnams don med par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar 'di gnas pa'o //
translated: Therefore, the sense faculties would be useless. This is the point.

analyzed: gal te sgra yongs su tshim par byed pa ma yin gyi /
translated: If sound does not satisfy,

analyzed: yongs su tshim pa'i sgra nyid las der 'gyur ba'i phyir na /
translated: then since the word complete satisfaction itself would be the cause,

analyzed: de dag don med pa kho na'o zhes lan 'debs pa ni @75a * //
translated: they are meaningless.

original: ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response is, ‚ÄúNo, it is not so.‚Äù

original: srid pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni da lta ba dang nye ba sa da ltar gyur pa dang 'dra ba zhes pa'i don yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: srid pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni da lta ba dang nye ba sa da ltar gyur pa dang 'dra ba zhes pa'i don yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is possible, it is like the present and the near, which are similar to the present.

original: dngos po'i rang bzhin gsal ba gcig pu nyid yin mod /
analyzed: dngos po'i rang bzhin gsal ba gcig pu nyid yin mod /
translated: The nature of things is only manifest.

analyzed: de ni nye ba dang da ltar ba nyid mngon sum gyi yul te /
translated: That is the object of direct perception, which is near and present.üîΩThe application of the word to that is meaningless, so it is applied elsewhere.

analyzed: de la sgra sbyor ba ni don med pas ni gzhan du sbyor ba yin no zhes brjod pa ni de lta na yang zhes bya ba'o //

analyzed: ci'i phyir gnyis po yongs su tshim pa'i rgyu ma yin zhe na /
translated: Why are the two not the cause of complete satisfaction?

analyzed: bltar mi snang ba zhes bya bar sbyar ro //

analyzed: des na zhas bya ba ni yongs su tshim par byed pa nyid kyis so //

analyzed: snang ba med pa nyid 'das pa la sogs pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the past, etc. are without appearance.

original: rang gi ngo bo mthong ba nyid las ma mchod pa dang / yongs su tshim par byed pa nyid du grub po zhes brjod pa ni mig la sogs pas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo mthong ba nyid las ma mchod pa dang / yongs su tshim par byed pa nyid du grub po zhes brjod pa ni mig la sogs pas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement it is established as not being seen and as satisfying by the very fact of seeing its own nature is the phrase by the eye, etc.

original: rang gi ngo bos mthong ba de yang sgra las rtogs pa 'das pa la sogs pa la yang yod do //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bos mthong ba de yang sgra las rtogs pa 'das pa la sogs pa la yang yod do //
translated: That seeing of its own nature also exists for the past, etc., which are understood from sound.

original: des na de dag mchod pa dang yongs su tshim bar byed pa nyid du ji ltar mi 'gyur snyam du dogs pa'o //
analyzed: des na de dag mchod pa dang yongs su tshim bar byed pa nyid du ji ltar mi 'gyur snyam du dogs pa'o //
translated: Therefore, the doubt is, How could they not be seen and satisfying?

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

analyzed: mchod pa yongs su tshim par byed pa ma yin no zhes brjod pa de yang mi 'thad do zhes brjod pa ni glu'i sgra ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement 'it is not satisfying to worship' is not tenable is the phrase the sound of singing.

original: sgrub par mi byed pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: sgrub par mi byed pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not that it does not accomplish.

original: 'on kyang sgrub par byed pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'on kyang sgrub par byed pa nyid do //
translated: But it is the very act of producing that is the cognition.

original: de bzhin du 'das pa la sog pa la yang rang gi ngo bo rtogs pa ni sgrub par byed pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'das pa la sog pa la yang rang gi ngo bo rtogs pa ni sgrub par byed pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The same is true of the past, etc. The meaning is that the cognition of its own nature is the very act of producing.

original: sgra ma chod pa nyid du dogs pa bsu ba ni chu rlabs kyi tshul du zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sgra ma chod pa nyid du dogs pa bsu ba ni chu rlabs kyi tshul du zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response to the objection that sound is not obstructed is in the phrase in the manner of a wave.

original: 'ongs pa ma dmigs pas gnod do zhes lan 'debs pa ni nye bar len pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'ongs pa ma dmigs pas gnod do zhes lan 'debs pa ni nye bar len pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response to the objection that the past is not perceived is in the phrase appropriation.

original: nye bar len pa ni sgra 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: nye bar len pa ni sgra 'dzin pa'o //
translated: The appropriation is the apprehension of sound.

original: de ni zhes bya ba ni sgra'o //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba ni sgra'o //
