analyzed: dngos po med pa brjod par bya ba yin na ni 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: If the non-thing is the object of expression, then it is.

original: de'i phyir dngos po med pa brjod byar thal bar 'gyur ro zhes dgongs ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir dngos po med pa brjod byar thal bar 'gyur ro zhes dgongs ba'o //
translated: Therefore, it is thought that the non-thing would be the object of expression.

original: gal te brjod par bya ba tha dad pa yin na gtso bor 'gyur ba yin te ba lang ba lang zhes bya ba bzhin no //
analyzed: gal te brjod par bya ba tha dad pa yin na gtso bor 'gyur ba yin te ba lang ba lang zhes bya ba bzhin no //
translated: If the object of expression is different, then it would be primary, like the word cow for a cow.

original: de med pa'i phyir ni btags par 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: de med pa'i phyir ni btags par 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: Because of its non-existence, it would be a designation,

original: khur bur ba lang zhes bya ba bzhin no zhes brjod pa ni 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: khur bur ba lang zhes bya ba bzhin no zhes brjod pa ni 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: like the word cow for a load. This is stated in If you say....

original: med pa'i yul can nyid bsgrub pa ni 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: med pa'i yul can nyid bsgrub pa ni 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The proof that it has a non-existent object is in this way.

original: lan ni de yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan ni de yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The answer is That also....

original: ngo bo gang du zhes pa ni snang ba tha dad par te de la mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ngo bo gang du zhes pa ni snang ba tha dad par te de la mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúIn what way?‚Äù means in the way that different appearances are not possible.

original: gang gis te dngos po mthong min pa zhes bya ba ni med pa'i yul can du thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gis te dngos po mthong min pa zhes bya ba ni med pa'i yul can du thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúBy whom?‚Äù means by one who does not see things, because it would follow that the object would be nonexistent.

original: yang sngon mthong ba sgro 'dogs phar nus pa bsu ba ni /
analyzed: yang sngon mthong ba sgro 'dogs phar nus pa bsu ba ni /
translated: Now, the opponent‚Äôs rejoinder to the assertion that the past is not recollected is as follows.

original: 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBut if it is not so, then how is it that‚Ä¶‚Äù

original: sngon mthong ba sgro 'dogs par khas blangs kyang ji ltar 'das pa la de'i ngo bor rtogs pa nyid da ltar sgro btags pa yin pa de bzhin du 'das pa ma yin pa la yang 'gyur la de lta na yang spyi don dam par mi 'gyur ro zhes
analyzed: sngon mthong ba sgro 'dogs par khas blangs kyang ji ltar 'das pa la de'i ngo bor rtogs pa nyid da ltar sgro btags pa yin pa de bzhin du 'das pa ma yin pa la yang 'gyur la de lta na yang spyi don dam par mi 'gyur ro zhes
translated: Even if one accepts that the past is recollected by superimposition, just as the past is cognized as having that nature, so too the present would be superimposed. But in that case, the universal would not be ultimately real.

original: lan brjod pa ni /
analyzed: lan brjod pa ni /
translated: The response to this is as follows.

original: de lta na ni 'o na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de lta na ni 'o na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIf that is so, then‚Ä¶‚Äù

original: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni sngon mthong ba sgro 'dogs pa med par ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni sngon mthong ba sgro 'dogs pa med par ro //
translated: ‚ÄúIf that is not so, then‚Ä¶‚Äù means without the superimposition of the past.

original: sgra las byung ba 'ba' zhig tu ni ma zad kyi rjes su dpag pas kyang ngo de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rjes su dpag pas kyang sngon mthong ba sgro btags nas rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra las byung ba 'ba' zhig tu ni ma zad kyi rjes su dpag pas kyang ngo de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rjes su dpag pas kyang sngon mthong ba sgro btags nas rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Not only from verbal testimony, but also from inference, because of that, because of the understanding through inference of what was seen previously, by superimposition.

original: thams cad du zhes bya ba ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba rnams la'o //
analyzed: thams cad du zhes bya ba ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba rnams la'o //
translated: Everywhere means in the past, present, and future.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: thams cad du zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: thams cad du zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Everywhere.üîΩIf what is grasped by inference is not ultimate, then what is grasped by direct perception will be ultimate.

original: gal te rjes su @82b dpag pas gzung ba don dam pa ma yin pa yang mngon sum gyis gzung ba ni don dam par 'gyur ro zhes dogs pa bsu ba ni 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te rjes su @82b dpag pas gzung ba don dam pa ma yin pa yang mngon sum gyis gzung ba ni don dam par 'gyur ro zhes dogs pa bsu ba ni 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: To anticipate this doubt, he says, But if it is said that it exists.

original: yod pa nyid ces bya ba ni sgrom btags pa'o //
analyzed: yod pa nyid ces bya ba ni sgrom btags pa'o //
translated: Existence is a superimposition.

original: 'o na ni zhes bya ba de ni sgro ma btags pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: 'o na ni zhes bya ba de ni sgro ma btags pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: But if it is said that it is not a superimposition, then it is not a superimposition by nature.üîΩWhat is that?

original: ci de zhes bya ba ni rjes su dpag pa'i yul lo //
analyzed: ci de zhes bya ba ni rjes su dpag pa'i yul lo //
translated: The object of inference.

original: gal te mngon sum gyis mthong ba gsal ba'i rang bzhin ni rjes su dpag pa'i yul ma yin la /
analyzed: gal te mngon sum gyis mthong ba gsal ba'i rang bzhin ni rjes su dpag pa'i yul ma yin la /
translated: If the nature of what is seen by direct perception is clear, it is not the object of inference.

original: mi gsal ba de de nyid 'di yin no zhe 'am /
analyzed: mi gsal ba de de nyid 'di yin no zhe 'am /
translated: If it is unclear, is it the object itself?üîΩOr is it realized from a distance?

original: rgyang ring po nas rtogs pa ni yul nyid do zhes dogs pa bsu ba ni 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rgyang ring po nas rtogs pa ni yul nyid do zhes dogs pa bsu ba ni 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response to this qualm is ‚ÄúBut if it is thought that . . .‚Äù

original: de 'di yin no snyam pa ni rnam par rtog pa yin pa'i phyir dang rgyang ring po'i rab rib la sogs pa ltar /
analyzed: de 'di yin no snyam pa ni rnam par rtog pa yin pa'i phyir dang rgyang ring po'i rab rib la sogs pa ltar /
translated: Because the thought ‚ÄúThis is that‚Äù is conceptual and because, like a distant object seen through a cataract,

original: rgyu'i nyes pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rgyu'i nyes pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: it is a fault of the cause,üîΩit is not direct perception.

original: mngon sum ma yin no zhes lan 'debs pa ni de yang mi bden te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mngon sum ma yin no zhes lan 'debs pa ni de yang mi bden te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response to this is ‚ÄúThat is not true.‚Äù

original: de 'di'o snyam pa'i shes pa sngon dang thun mong ba'i yul can ni mngon sum nyid yod pa ma yin pa kho na ste /
analyzed: de 'di'o snyam pa'i shes pa sngon dang thun mong ba'i yul can ni mngon sum nyid yod pa ma yin pa kho na ste /
translated: The cognition that thinks ‚ÄúThis is that‚Äù does not have a present object.

original: 'on kyang rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'on kyang rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa nyid do //
translated: It is not direct perception at all, but rather conceptual.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: dbang po las skyes pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbang po las skyes pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it does not arise from the sense faculties.

original: 'on te dbang po las ma skyes kyang mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir mngon sum yin no snyam du dogs na /
analyzed: 'on te dbang po las ma skyes kyang mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir mngon sum yin no snyam du dogs na /
translated: But if you suspect that, although it is not produced from a sense faculty, it is direct perception because it is made manifest,

original: mngon sum bya ba med pa'i phyir zhes smos so //
analyzed: mngon sum bya ba med pa'i phyir zhes smos so //
translated: [the root text] states, ‚Äúbecause there is no activity of direct perception.‚Äù

original: 'di nyid brjod pa ni snga ma dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid brjod pa ni snga ma dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is what is being said: ‚ÄúThe former . . .‚Äù

original: mngon sum ni dngos po'i yul can nyid yin na /
analyzed: mngon sum ni dngos po'i yul can nyid yin na /
translated: If direct perception is only that which has an existent object,

original: sngon dang thun mong ba nyid ni dngos po ma yin no //
analyzed: sngon dang thun mong ba nyid ni dngos po ma yin no //
translated: the commonality of the former is not an existent.

original: des na ji ltar de'i yul can mngon sum du gyur ces brjod pa ni khyad par zhig kyang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: des na ji ltar de'i yul can mngon sum du gyur ces brjod pa ni khyad par zhig kyang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Therefore, how could it be said that it is the object of direct perception? This is what is being said: ‚ÄúEven if it is a distinction . . .‚Äù

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: yod pa med chos zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yod pa med chos zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBecause it is a non-existent phenomenon.‚Äù

original: gnyi ga thun mong nyid yin na //
analyzed: gnyi ga thun mong nyid yin na //
translated: If it is the commonality of both . . .

original: zhes bya ba ni de nyid 'di yin no zhes bya ba 'das pa dang da ltar ba gnyi ga yin la de dag gi thun mong ba nyid yin na ni dngos por yang 'gyur te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de nyid 'di yin no zhes bya ba 'das pa dang da ltar ba gnyi ga yin la de dag gi thun mong ba nyid yin na ni dngos por yang 'gyur te /
translated: This is the same as what was said above. If it is the commonality of both the past and the present, saying ‚Äúthis is that,‚Äù then it would be an existent,

original: yod pa'i chos yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yod pa'i chos yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: because it is a phenomenon that exists. This is the meaning.

original: 'das par snang ba dang lhan cig da ltar ba tha mi dad par ni mngon sum gyis rtogs pa med do zhes brjod pa ni /
analyzed: 'das par snang ba dang lhan cig da ltar ba tha mi dad par ni mngon sum gyis rtogs pa med do zhes brjod pa ni /
translated: It is not the case that the present is directly perceived as not different from the appearance of the past.

original: de yang mi 'thad de zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de yang mi 'thad de zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is not tenable, he says.

original: rnam par rtog pa la yang de'i byed pa las ma gtogs par thun mong ba'i rang bzhin yod pa ma yin no zhes brjod pa ni du ma nyid du zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa la yang de'i byed pa las ma gtogs par thun mong ba'i rang bzhin yod pa ma yin no zhes brjod pa ni du ma nyid du zhes bya ba'o //
translated: And it is not the case that a common nature exists apart from the activity of conceptualization. This is what he says in the phrase ‚Äúbecause of the plurality.‚Äù

original: de'i phyir med pa kho na zhes bya ba don dam pa ma yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i phyir med pa kho na zhes bya ba don dam pa ma yin pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, it is said that the past, etc., do not exist ultimately.

original: de ltar rgyu mtshan med pa'i phyir 'das pa la sogs pa las 'ga' yang nye bar btags pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa @83a * //
analyzed: de ltar rgyu mtshan med pa'i phyir 'das pa la sogs pa las 'ga' yang nye bar btags pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa @83a * //
translated: Thus, because there is no reason for it, it is not the case that anything is designated in dependence on the past, etc.üîΩThis is what is taught.

original: yin no // de ni 'jig rten pa'i nye bar btags pa yang med do zhes brjod pa ni 'dir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yin no // de ni 'jig rten pa'i nye bar btags pa yang med do zhes brjod pa ni 'dir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is not the case that there is even a worldly designation of it. This is what is said in the phrase ‚Äúhere.‚Äù

original: blo ni 'khrul pa'ang med pa dang / 'khrul pa'ang gi sgra rim pa bzhin du yin no //
analyzed: blo ni 'khrul pa'ang med pa dang / 'khrul pa'ang gi sgra rim pa bzhin du yin no //
translated: The word ‚Äúeven‚Äù in the phrase ‚Äúeven a mistaken cognition‚Äù is in the sense of a series.

original: de dag ni go rims bzhin du dngos dang sgro 'dogs pa ni rgyu mtshan yin no //
analyzed: de dag ni go rims bzhin du dngos dang sgro 'dogs pa ni rgyu mtshan yin no //
translated: These are, respectively, the real and the superimposition, which are the reasons.

original: de skad du yang cig shos ni zhes 'chad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de skad du yang cig shos ni zhes 'chad par 'gyur te /
translated: And it is said, ‚ÄúThe other is the opposite of that.‚Äù

original: 'khrul pa'o // ci 'ga' zhig tu de ltar grub pa yod dam snyam na bram ze'i khye'u la ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'khrul pa'o // ci 'ga' zhig tu de ltar grub pa yod dam snyam na bram ze'i khye'u la ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If one thinks, ‚ÄúIs there any such establishment?‚Äù it is said, ‚ÄúThe young brahmin.‚Äù

original: des na zhes bya ba ni 'khrul pas so //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni 'khrul pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúTherefore‚Äù means because of delusion.

original: de ltar zhes ni ma 'khrul par ro //
analyzed: de ltar zhes ni ma 'khrul par ro //
translated: ‚ÄúThus‚Äù means without delusion.

original: gtan tshigs de'i phyir na de ni dngos yin no zhes grub po //
analyzed: gtan tshigs de'i phyir na de ni dngos yin no zhes grub po //
translated: For that reason, it is established that it is real.

original: skabs su bab pa la yang gnyi ga de lta bu nyid do zhes gsungs pa ni 'dir zhes bya ste /
analyzed: skabs su bab pa la yang gnyi ga de lta bu nyid do zhes gsungs pa ni 'dir zhes bya ste /
translated: In the present context, it is said that both are like that. ‚ÄúHere‚Äù means

original: sgra las byung ba'i shes pa la'o //
analyzed: sgra las byung ba'i shes pa la'o //
translated: in the cognition that arises from sound.

original: gnyi ga ni da ltar dang da ltar ma yin pa'i yul can dag la'o //
analyzed: gnyi ga ni da ltar dang da ltar ma yin pa'i yul can dag la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBoth‚Äù refers to those with present and non-present objects.

original: des na zhes bya ba ni ma 'khrul pa'i blo'i yul yin pas na'o //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni ma 'khrul pa'i blo'i yul yin pas na'o //
translated: ‚ÄúTherefore‚Äù means because it is the object of an undeluded mind.

original: 'di snyam du 'khrul pa'i shes pa'i yul yin pas ni nye bar btags pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang don med pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes dogs pa bsu ba ni med pa'i don nyid kyis zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di snyam du 'khrul pa'i shes pa'i yul yin pas ni nye bar btags pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang don med pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes dogs pa bsu ba ni med pa'i don nyid kyis zhes bya ba'o //
translated: One might think, It is not a mere designation because it is the object of a mistaken consciousness, but rather because it is a non-existent object. The response to this is because of the meaning of non-existence.

original: gal te zhes bya ba ni lan no //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba ni lan no //
translated: The word if is the response.

original: de nyid las zhes bya ba ni med pa'i don can nyid las so //
analyzed: de nyid las zhes bya ba ni med pa'i don can nyid las so //
translated: From that itself means from the meaning of non-existence.

original: 'di ni dngos ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid du 'thad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni dngos ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid du 'thad pa ma yin te /
translated: This is not tenable as the characteristic of non-entity.

original: bzlog pa'i phyir zhes brjod pa ni gzhan yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bzlog pa'i phyir zhes brjod pa ni gzhan yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement because of the opposite is the other.

original: sgra zhes bya ba ni dngos po med par brjod pa'o //üîΩde la ni dngos po med pa la'o //
analyzed: sgra zhes bya ba ni dngos po med par brjod pa'o // de la ni dngos po med pa la'o //
translated: Sound is the expression of non-entity.

original: dngos po med pa de dang mtshungs pa'i phyir bu la sogs pa'i de'i don mi byed pa'i dngos gzhan la bral ba yin te /
analyzed: dngos po med pa de dang mtshungs pa'i phyir bu la sogs pa'i de'i don mi byed pa'i dngos gzhan la bral ba yin te /
translated: There, in non-existence, that non-existence is similar to the son and so on, which is the other entity that does not perform its function, being separated from it.

original: gang gi phyir 'khrul par rtogs pa can yin pas so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'khrul par rtogs pa can yin pas so //
translated: Because it is understood as mistaken.

original: des na zhes bya ba ni grags pa'i dbang gis so ;
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni grags pa'i dbang gis so ;
translated: Therefore means by the power of what is well known.

original: / mtshungs phyir zhes bya ba ni ma 'khrul pa can du'o //
analyzed: / mtshungs phyir zhes bya ba ni ma 'khrul pa can du'o //
translated: Because of similarity means because of being non-erroneous.üîΩIf it is thought that it becomes a real object because it has a real and unreal object, and because of not being different in meaning, like the word 'cow', anticipating that doubt, he teaches that in both cases there is only one thing to be taught.üîΩThe word both is for the sake of showing that the word 'cow' is not different in meaning from the word 'non-cow'.üîΩThe word non-cow is for the sake of showing that the word 'cow' is not different in meaning from the word 'non-cow'.

original: gal te dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i yul can nyid kyis don tha dad pa ma yin pa'i phyir ba lang gi sgra bzhin du dngos kyi don du 'gyur ro snyam du dogs pa bsu nas gnyis kar yang bstan par bya ba gcig nyid par bstan parüîΩni dngos po med pa 'dzin pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i yul can nyid kyis don tha dad pa ma yin pa'i phyir ba lang gi sgra bzhin du dngos kyi don du 'gyur ro snyam du dogs pa bsu nas gnyis kar yang bstan par bya ba gcig nyid par bstan par ni dngos po med pa 'dzin pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The word cow is for the sake of showing that the word 'non-cow' is not different in meaning from the word 'cow'.üîΩThe word cow is for the sake of showing that the word 'non-cow' is not different in meaning from the word 'cow'.üîΩThe word cow is for the sake of showing that the word 'non-cow' is not different in meaning from the word 'cow'.

original: bum pa zhes bya ba'i sgra ni 'das pa 'am ma 'ongs pa la tha dad par 'jug pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //üîΩci ste zhes bya ba ste 'jug pa ni sgra dang shes pa dag go //üîΩspyi'i rnam pa zhes bya ba ni lan no //
analyzed: bum pa zhes bya ba'i sgra ni 'das pa 'am ma 'ongs pa la tha dad par 'jug pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // ci ste zhes bya ba ste 'jug pa ni sgra dang shes pa dag go // spyi'i rnam pa zhes bya ba ni lan no //
translated: The word cow is for the sake of showing that the word 'non-cow' is not different in meaning from the word 'cow'.üîΩThe word cow is for the sake of showing that the word 'non-cow' is not different in meaning from the word 'cow'.üîΩThe word cow is for the sake of showing that the word 'non-cow' is not different in meaning from the word 'cow'.üîΩThe word cow is for the sake of showing that the word 'non-cow' is not different in meaning from the word 'cow'.üîΩThe word cow is for the sake of showing that the word 'non-cow' is not different in meaning from the word 'cow'.üîΩThe word cow is for the sake of showing that the word 'non-cow' is not different in meaning from the word 'cow'.üîΩThe word cow is for the sake of showing that the word 'non-cow' is not different in meaning from the word 'cow'.üîΩThe word cow is for the sake of showing that the word 'non-cow' is not different in meaning from the word 'cow'.

original: da ltar ba dang 'das pa la sogs pa rnam pa mtshungs pa nyid yin na ni med pa @83b nyid du mi 'gyur te /üîΩda ltar ba nyid bzhin no //
analyzed: da ltar ba dang 'das pa la sogs pa rnam pa mtshungs pa nyid yin na ni med pa @83b nyid du mi 'gyur te /üîΩda ltar ba nyid bzhin no //
translated: The word cow is for the sake of showing that the word 'non-cow' is not different in

original: de na 'das pa la sogs pa med pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba 'di ga las yin te ma yin pa nyid do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de na 'das pa la sogs pa med pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba 'di ga las yin te ma yin pa nyid do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: How could it be that one enters into the non-existence of the past, etc.? It means that it is not so.

original: rtogs pa nyid las zhes bya ba ni dogs pa bsu ba ste rtogs par bya ba las so //
analyzed: rtogs pa nyid las zhes bya ba ni dogs pa bsu ba ste rtogs par bya ba las so //
translated: From the very understanding, means anticipating an objection, from the understanding of the object.

original: de ltar 'gyur bas zhes bya ba ni yod par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur bas zhes bya ba ni yod par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Since it would be so, means since it would exist.

original: de'i phyir med pa la 'jug par 'thad do zhe na /üîΩzhig pa zhes bya ba ni lan no //
analyzed: de'i phyir med pa la 'jug par 'thad do zhe na / zhig pa zhes bya ba ni lan no //
translated: Therefore, it is reasonable to enter into non-existence.

original: 'das pa la sogs pa zhig par ma shes pa la'o //
analyzed: 'das pa la sogs pa zhig par ma shes pa la'o //
translated: The response is: ‚ÄúThe past, etc. are not understood as destroyed.‚Äù

original: 'das pa la sogs pa'o snyam pa'i rtogs pa tha dad pa gang yin pa de yang med pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'das pa la sogs pa'o snyam pa'i rtogs pa tha dad pa gang yin pa de yang med pa nyid do //
translated: The understanding that the past, etc. exist is also non-existent.

original: khyad par ma bzung ba ni tha dad pa'i blor 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: khyad par ma bzung ba ni tha dad pa'i blor 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: An understanding of difference does not occur without apprehending a difference.

original: bzung na yang de yang da ltar ba bzhin du bzung ba'i phyir ji ltar med pa la 'jug pas nye bar btags pa nyid du 'gyur /
analyzed: bzung na yang de yang da ltar ba bzhin du bzung ba'i phyir ji ltar med pa la 'jug pas nye bar btags pa nyid du 'gyur /
translated: Even if it is apprehended, since it is apprehended as if it were present, how could it be designated as an entry into non-existence?

original: 'on te khyad par ma bzung yang rtogs pa tha dad pa yod pa nyid do snyam du dogs pa bsu nas gang las zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: 'on te khyad par ma bzung yang rtogs pa tha dad pa yod pa nyid do snyam du dogs pa bsu nas gang las zhes gsungs te /
translated: But if you think that even without apprehending a difference, there is still a difference in their cognition, then the response is: ‚ÄúFrom what?‚Äù

original: 'das pa'i khyad par la'o //
analyzed: 'das pa'i khyad par la'o //
translated: This is in regard to the difference of the past.

original: gnyi ga'i thun mong yin pa'i phyir na the tshom nyid du 'gyur ro zhes khas len pa'i dogs pa bsu ba ni /
analyzed: gnyi ga'i thun mong yin pa'i phyir na the tshom nyid du 'gyur ro zhes khas len pa'i dogs pa bsu ba ni /
translated: The response to the qualm that it is still doubt because it is common to both is:

original: the tshom za ba zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: the tshom za ba zhes bya ba ste /
translated: ‚ÄúDoubt.‚Äù

original: ji zhig pa'am 'on te ma zhig pa la yin te de lta bu'i rang bzhin du'o //
analyzed: ji zhig pa'am 'on te ma zhig pa la yin te de lta bu'i rang bzhin du'o //
translated: Is it in regard to what has ceased or not ceased? It is in regard to such a nature.

original: de la dngos po 'dzin par mi 'thad do zhes lan 'debs pa ni /
analyzed: de la dngos po 'dzin par mi 'thad do zhes lan 'debs pa ni /
translated: The response to the qualm that it is not tenable to apprehend a thing is:

original: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIf it is a thing.‚Äù

original: dngos po 'dzin kyang 'dra ba'i rgyu mtshan can gyi the tshom du 'gyur ro zhes dogs pa bsu ba ni snang yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dngos po 'dzin kyang 'dra ba'i rgyu mtshan can gyi the tshom du 'gyur ro zhes dogs pa bsu ba ni snang yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response to the qualm that even if it apprehends a thing, it is still doubt because it has a similar reason is: ‚ÄúEven if it appears.‚Äù

original: 'dra ba med pa'i phyir des the tshom med pa ma yin no zhes lan 'debs pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'dra ba med pa'i phyir des the tshom med pa ma yin no zhes lan 'debs pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response to the qualm that it is not non-doubt because it lacks similarity is: ‚ÄúIf it is not.‚Äù

original: de nyid du zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid du zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is in regard to that itself.

original: tha dad par mtshon pa 'dra ba'i rgyu mtshan yin pa'i dogs pa bsu ba ni ci ste dus zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: tha dad par mtshon pa 'dra ba'i rgyu mtshan yin pa'i dogs pa bsu ba ni ci ste dus zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The reason for the appearance of difference is suspected. Why? Time.

original: tha dad par bsgrub par bya ba dus tha dad par ni ma nges pa yin no zhes lan 'debs pa ni de yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: tha dad par bsgrub par bya ba dus tha dad par ni ma nges pa yin no zhes lan 'debs pa ni de yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The answer is: The difference is not ascertained as a difference in time.

original: de las zhes bya ba ni dus tha dad las so //
analyzed: de las zhes bya ba ni dus tha dad las so //
translated: That is, from a difference in time.

original: de dang gzhan ni don yod pa nyid dang don med pa nyid do //
analyzed: de dang gzhan ni don yod pa nyid dang don med pa nyid do //
translated: The other is the existence and non-existence of the object.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na don yod nyid la'ang zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na don yod nyid la'ang zhes gsungs so //
translated: Why? Because of the existence of the object.

original: ci ste de ltar grub par yod snyam na ji ltar khyed kyi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ci ste de ltar grub par yod snyam na ji ltar khyed kyi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If you think it is established in that way, then how?

original: gang rjes su dpag pa yin pa de ni bden pa'i don can yin te /
analyzed: gang rjes su dpag pa yin pa de ni bden pa'i don can yin te /
translated: What is inference has a true object,

original: dper na rjes su dpog pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na rjes su dpog pa bzhin no //
translated: like inference itself.

original: sgra'i shes pa yang rjes su dpog pa yin no zhes pa'i dogs pa bsu ba ni 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sgra'i shes pa yang rjes su dpog pa yin no zhes pa'i dogs pa bsu ba ni 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The suspected objection is: If the cognition of sound is inference.

original: don yod pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: don yod pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The existence of the object is not.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na rjes su dpag pa yang zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na rjes su dpag pa yang zhes gsungs so //
translated: Why? Because inference also is like that.

original: 'di ni thun mong gi ma nges @84a * //
analyzed: 'di ni thun mong gi ma nges @84a * //
translated: This is a common indecision.

original: pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: rtags kyi khyad par las bden pa'i don can dang cig shos kyi rnam par dbye ba dogs par byed pa ni rtags kyi khyad par las zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rtags kyi khyad par las bden pa'i don can dang cig shos kyi rnam par dbye ba dogs par byed pa ni rtags kyi khyad par las zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The doubt about the distinction of the real and the other from the particular reason is the particular reason.

original: 'di nyid rnam par 'brel pa ni 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid rnam par 'brel pa ni 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This very connection is like this.

original: rtags las zhes bya ba ni thal ba dang du ba la sogs pa las so ;
analyzed: rtags las zhes bya ba ni thal ba dang du ba la sogs pa las so ;
translated: From the reason, from smoke and so on.

original: / dngos po'i yul can nyid ma yin pa'i phyir na mtshungs pa kho na'o zhes lan 'debs pa ni de yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: / dngos po'i yul can nyid ma yin pa'i phyir na mtshungs pa kho na'o zhes lan 'debs pa ni de yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because it is not an object of real things, it is the same. This is the answer.

original: de ni zhes bya ba ni rjes su dpag pa'i blo'o //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba ni rjes su dpag pa'i blo'o //
translated: That is, the inferential cognition.

original: dngos la zhes bya ba ni dngos po'i yul la'o //
analyzed: dngos la zhes bya ba ni dngos po'i yul la'o //
translated: In the real thing, in the object of real things.

original: de'i tshe lo ma las byung ba dang / rtsa ba las byung ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa gzhan la the tshom med par 'gyur /
analyzed: de'i tshe lo ma las byung ba dang / rtsa ba las byung ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa gzhan la the tshom med par 'gyur /
translated: At that time, there would be no doubt about the other aspects such as arising from leaves, arising from roots, and so on.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: rnam pa thams cad ces smos so //üîΩgang gi phyir de ltar dngos po'i yul can nyid yin gyi the tshom med par 'gyur ba de'i phyir rjes su dpag pa de la yang /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad ces smos so // gang gi phyir de ltar dngos po'i yul can nyid yin gyi the tshom med par 'gyur ba de'i phyir rjes su dpag pa de la yang /
translated: Because all aspects are mentioned.üîΩBecause it is like that, it is an object of doubt, not an object of inference.

original: me la sogs pa'i rnam pa dngos po med pa yin no zhes bya bar rigs so //
analyzed: me la sogs pa'i rnam pa dngos po med pa yin no zhes bya bar rigs so //
translated: Therefore, it is reasonable to say that the aspects of fire, etc. are not real entities.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: bshad pa lo ma las byung ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du the tshom gyi yul yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bshad pa lo ma las byung ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du the tshom gyi yul yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the object of doubt, like the nature of something arisen from leaves, etc.

original: dpe ni sgra'i rnam pa bzhin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dpe ni sgra'i rnam pa bzhin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The example is like the aspect of sound.

original: dper na sgra las byung ba'i rtogs pa ma lus pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa gang yin pa de ni dkar po la sogs pa'i ngo bor the tshom za ba'i phyir dngos po ma yin pa de bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na sgra las byung ba'i rtogs pa ma lus pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa gang yin pa de ni dkar po la sogs pa'i ngo bor the tshom za ba'i phyir dngos po ma yin pa de bzhin no //
translated: For example, all cognitions arisen from sound, etc. are not real entities, because their aspects are doubted to be the nature of white, etc.

original: gal te rnam pa thams cad gzung ba la yang ji ltar the tshom du mi 'gyur zhes dogs na /
analyzed: gal te rnam pa thams cad gzung ba la yang ji ltar the tshom du mi 'gyur zhes dogs na /
translated: If it is doubted that all aspects are apprehended, how is it not doubt?

original: rtogs pa nyid la ni zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: rtogs pa nyid la ni zhes gsungs so //
translated: It is said that it is only cognition.

original: gal te gzung ba yang mngon sum ltar cha 'ga' zhig la nges pa med pa'i phyir ma bzung bar mngon par rlom pa yin no snyam pa ni /
analyzed: gal te gzung ba yang mngon sum ltar cha 'ga' zhig la nges pa med pa'i phyir ma bzung bar mngon par rlom pa yin no snyam pa ni /
translated: If you think that the object is not apprehended because, like direct perception, it is not ascertained in some part,

original: rnam pa gzhan las zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan las zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then it is from another aspect.

original: nges pa'i bdag nyid can gyi rjes su dpag pa la ni mngon sum gyi tshul yod pa ma yin no zhes lan 'debs pa ni /
analyzed: nges pa'i bdag nyid can gyi rjes su dpag pa la ni mngon sum gyi tshul yod pa ma yin no zhes lan 'debs pa ni /
translated: The reply is that a definite nature does not have the mode of direct perception.

original: the tshom gyi rnam pa gzhan gang yin pa der ni'o //
analyzed: the tshom gyi rnam pa gzhan gang yin pa der ni'o //
translated: Any other aspect of doubt is that.

original: de lta min zhes bya ba ni ma rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: de lta min zhes bya ba ni ma rtogs pa'o //
translated: Otherwise, it is non-understanding.

original: de ltar rnam par rtog nas rim bzhin sel ba ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar rnam par rtog nas rim bzhin sel ba ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Having thus conceived, the sequential exclusion is if.

original: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni ma rtogs pa the tshom ga las te /
analyzed: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni ma rtogs pa the tshom ga las te /
translated: Otherwise, how could there be doubt about non-understanding?

original: ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the absurdity.

original: gal te zhes bya ba ni 'chad pa'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba ni 'chad pa'o //
translated: If is the explanation.

original: de la zhes bya ba ni ma rtogs pa'i rnam pa gzhan la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni ma rtogs pa'i rnam pa gzhan la'o //
translated: There is the non-understanding of another aspect of doubt.

original: gal te 'di la the tshom za na skyon ci yod snyam du dogs na /
analyzed: gal te 'di la the tshom za na skyon ci yod snyam du dogs na /
translated: If there is doubt about this, what is the fault?

original: gal te ma rtogs pa nyid la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te ma rtogs pa nyid la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIf there is no understanding‚Äù means if there is no understanding of the object of doubt.

original: the tshom ni the tshom gyi yul la bya'o //
analyzed: the tshom ni the tshom gyi yul la bya'o //
translated: ‚ÄúDoubt‚Äù is the object of doubt.

original: mi snang ba zhes bya ba ni snang ba @84b nyams pa tsam la'o //
analyzed: mi snang ba zhes bya ba ni snang ba @84b nyams pa tsam la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúNon-appearance‚Äù means the mere loss of appearance.

original: gal te zhes bya ba ni dogs pa bsu ba ste /
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba ni dogs pa bsu ba ste /
translated: ‚ÄúIf‚Äù is a hypothetical question.

original: mi rtogs pa nyid la'o //
analyzed: mi rtogs pa nyid la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúNo understanding‚Äù means no understanding of the object of doubt.

original: gang gis ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba la rtogs pa la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gis ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba la rtogs pa la ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not that there is no understanding of what is too obvious.

original: g-yo ba dang mi g-yo ba la ni rtsva las byung ba'am lo ma las byung ba zhes bya ba ste de lta bu'i rang bzhin can no //
analyzed: g-yo ba dang mi g-yo ba la ni rtsva las byung ba'am lo ma las byung ba zhes bya ba ste de lta bu'i rang bzhin can no //
translated: ‚ÄúMoving or unmoving‚Äù means that which arises from grass or leaves.

original: gzhan zhes bya ba rjes su dpag pa'i rdzas las byung ba la'o //
analyzed: gzhan zhes bya ba rjes su dpag pa'i rdzas las byung ba la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOther‚Äù means that which arises from inferred substances.

original: gal te rtogs na zhes bya ba ni lan te /
analyzed: gal te rtogs na zhes bya ba ni lan te /
translated: ‚ÄúIf there is understanding‚Äù is the answer.

original: rjes su dpag pa rtsva las byung ba la sogs pa nges na'o //üîΩgzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rnam par rtog pa gnyis byas nas dang po sel ba na /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa rtsva las byung ba la sogs pa nges na'o // gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rnam par rtog pa gnyis byas nas dang po sel ba na /
translated: It is when there is certainty about the inferred arising from grass, etc.üîΩ‚ÄúMoreover‚Äù and so on is the second conception.

original: rnam par rtog pa'i rang gi ngo bo zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i rang gi ngo bo zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The first is eliminated, and the nature of the conception is stated.

original: gzhal bya rtsva las byung ba la sogs pa la the tshom za bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: gzhal bya rtsva las byung ba la sogs pa la the tshom za bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: One would not doubt the existence of the object, such as the grass, etc.

original: nges pa nyid kyis g-yo ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nges pa nyid kyis g-yo ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is certain and does not waver.

original: gnyis pa sel ba ni 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa sel ba ni 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The second alternative is the exclusion, ‚ÄúOr, rather. . .

original: 'on te 'di las zhes bya ba ni snang ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te 'di las zhes bya ba ni snang ba'o //
translated: ‚Äù ‚ÄúOr, rather, from this‚Äù refers to the appearance.

original: gal te gang gi ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba la mthong ba tsam la ni the tshom za ba ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te gang gi ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba la mthong ba tsam la ni the tshom za ba ma yin no //
translated: If one doubts the mere seeing of what is too far away, then one would doubt the seeing of the object itself.

original: 'on kyang spyir chos can mthong la /
analyzed: 'on kyang spyir chos can mthong la /
translated: But, in general, one sees the subject,

original: de'i khyad par ni ma mthong ba la de mthong bar 'dod pa the tshom du 'gyur ba la mthong ba yin no zhes brjod pa ni /
analyzed: de'i khyad par ni ma mthong ba la de mthong bar 'dod pa the tshom du 'gyur ba la mthong ba yin no zhes brjod pa ni /
translated: and one doubts the seeing of its particularities, although one does not see them.

original: gal te spyi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te spyi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If one says, ‚ÄúI see it,‚ÄùüîΩbecause the particular is not directly perceived.

original: khyad par mngon sum ma yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba 'di'i don 'dri ba ni khyad par mngon sum ni gang de'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: khyad par mngon sum ma yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba 'di'i don 'dri ba ni khyad par mngon sum ni gang de'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The meaning of this is questioned: ‚ÄúWhat is the direct perception of the particular?‚Äù

original: mngon sum las gzhan pa'i mngon sum ma pa yin pa dran pa'i shes pa'am /
analyzed: mngon sum las gzhan pa'i mngon sum ma pa yin pa dran pa'i shes pa'am /
translated: The direct perception of the particular is the memory cognition that is different from direct perception.

original: mngon sum bkag pa tsam zhig yin par 'gyur /
analyzed: mngon sum bkag pa tsam zhig yin par 'gyur /
translated: It would be merely the negation of perception.

original: de la dran pa'i shes pa'ang khyad par gyi rang gi ngo bo la dmigs pa yin pa des na ji ltar the tshom du 'gyur /
analyzed: de la dran pa'i shes pa'ang khyad par gyi rang gi ngo bo la dmigs pa yin pa des na ji ltar the tshom du 'gyur /
translated: And since the memory consciousness also has as its object the specific nature of the object, how could it be doubt?

original: med bar dgag pa ni ma mthong tsam gyi the tshom du 'gyur ro zhes bshad zin to zhes brjod pa ni med pa ma yin pa dag las zhes bya ba'o //üîΩgal te khyad par dran pa ni dmigs pa dang bcas pa nyid du /
analyzed: med bar dgag pa ni ma mthong tsam gyi the tshom du 'gyur ro zhes bshad zin to zhes brjod pa ni med pa ma yin pa dag las zhes bya ba'o // gal te khyad par dran pa ni dmigs pa dang bcas pa nyid du /
translated: We have already explained that the non-apprehension of an object is doubt that it does not exist.üîΩIf you say that the memory of a specific object is doubt because it is not ascertained as having an object,üîΩwe reply:

original: ma nges pa'i phyir the tshom za ba yin no zhes dogs pa bsu ba ni /
analyzed: ma nges pa'i phyir the tshom za ba yin no zhes dogs pa bsu ba ni /
translated: But if you say that the memory of a specific object is doubt because it is not ascertained as having an object,

original: 'on te ci zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te ci zhes bya ba'o //
translated: we reply:üîΩBecause it is not ascertained as having an object.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa dang bcas pa nyid du ma nges pa'i phyir ro //üîΩde la yang zhes bya ba ni khyad par dran pa la yang ngo //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa dang bcas pa nyid du ma nges pa'i phyir ro // de la yang zhes bya ba ni khyad par dran pa la yang ngo //
translated: And in that case,

original: 'di la nyes pa yang snga ma bzhin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'di la nyes pa yang snga ma bzhin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: the fault is the same as before.

original: snang ba gnyis ka'i thun mong yin pa'i phyir the tshom za'o zhes dogs pa bsu ba ni ci ste de ni ste de ni zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: snang ba gnyis ka'i thun mong yin pa'i phyir the tshom za'o zhes dogs pa bsu ba ni ci ste de ni ste de ni zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The response to this qualm is ‚ÄúWhy is that?‚Äù

original: rigs pa gzhan de ni'o //
analyzed: rigs pa gzhan de ni'o //
translated: The other reason is ‚Äúthat.‚Äù

original: bzlog par yang ni dmigs pa dang bcas par ro //üîΩdon dang don ma @85a * //
analyzed: bzlog par yang ni dmigs pa dang bcas par ro // don dang don ma @85a * //
translated: It is also observed to be associated with an object.

original: yin pa thun mong ba'i snang ba ni don ma yin no zhes lan 'debs pa ni 'o na ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yin pa thun mong ba'i snang ba ni don ma yin no zhes lan 'debs pa ni 'o na ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response to the objection that the appearance that is common to both the object and the nonobject is not the object is ‚ÄúWell then.‚Äù

original: ma yin pas dran pa the tshom gyi rgyu mtshan yin na spyi mngon sum yin pa'i phyir ro zhes mngon sum khyad par du mi rigs so zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ma yin pas dran pa the tshom gyi rgyu mtshan yin na spyi mngon sum yin pa'i phyir ro zhes mngon sum khyad par du mi rigs so zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If memory is the reason for doubt, then it is not reasonable to distinguish perception, because the universal is perceived.

original: khyad par gang las zhes bya ba ni sdong gru la sogs pa la'o //
analyzed: khyad par gang las zhes bya ba ni sdong gru la sogs pa la'o //
translated: From what distinction? From a boat, etc.

original: de nyid yin nam zhes bya ba ni snang bzhin pa 'brel pa'i spyi'o //
analyzed: de nyid yin nam zhes bya ba ni snang bzhin pa 'brel pa'i spyi'o //
translated: Is it that? The universal of the related that is appearing.

original: gzhan yin zhes bya ba ni 'greng ba las gzhan pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan yin zhes bya ba ni 'greng ba las gzhan pa'o //
translated: Is it another? Other than the standing.

original: de nyid kyi rang bzhin yin no zhe na zhes bya ba ni 'greng ba nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid kyi rang bzhin yin no zhe na zhes bya ba ni 'greng ba nyid do //
translated: ‚ÄúIt is the nature of that itself‚Äù means it is standing.

original: ji ltar sdong gru la sogs pa'i snam bu mthong ba las bum pa nyid la the tshom du 'gyur ba ni med do //
analyzed: ji ltar sdong gru la sogs pa'i snam bu mthong ba las bum pa nyid la the tshom du 'gyur ba ni med do //
translated: There is no doubt about the pot, just from seeing the cloth on the pole, etc.

original: de las yang zhes bya ba ni dogs pa'o //
analyzed: de las yang zhes bya ba ni dogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúFrom that‚Äù means doubt.

original: de zhes bya ba ni khyad par gyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni khyad par gyi rang bzhin no //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù means the nature of the distinction.

original: de yang re re po nyid la'o //
analyzed: de yang re re po nyid la'o //
translated: And that is in each one.

original: gal te zhes bya ba ni lan no //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba ni lan no //
translated: ‚ÄúIf‚Äù is the answer.

original: res 'ga' zhes bya ba ni dogs pa'o //
analyzed: res 'ga' zhes bya ba ni dogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúSometimes‚Äù means doubt.

original: re re po nyid kyi spyi la sdong gru dang skyes pa dag cig car med pas na gang rung zhig ma mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: re re po nyid kyi spyi la sdong gru dang skyes pa dag cig car med pas na gang rung zhig ma mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Since the pole and the man are not simultaneous in the universal of each one, the meaning is that one or the other is not seen.

original: gzhan gyi tshe zhes bya ba ni lan no //
analyzed: gzhan gyi tshe zhes bya ba ni lan no //
translated: ‚ÄúAt another time‚Äù is the answer.

original: dogs pa ni gnyis kar zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: dogs pa ni gnyis kar zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The doubt is ‚Äúin both,‚Äù

original: sdong grub dang skyes bu'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: sdong grub dang skyes bu'i bdag nyid do //
translated: meaning the nature of the pole and the man.

original: lan ni ji ltar zhes bya ste gcig gi tshe gnyis ka mthong ba med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: lan ni ji ltar zhes bya ste gcig gi tshe gnyis ka mthong ba med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The answer is ‚Äúhow,‚Äù meaning that at one time both are not seen.

original: dus kyi dbye ba gnyis kar mthong bar dogs pa bsu ba ni dus tha dad par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dus kyi dbye ba gnyis kar mthong bar dogs pa bsu ba ni dus tha dad par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The objection is anticipated: ‚ÄúIf it is seen in both ways, then it would be different times.‚Äù

original: lan ni dran pa yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan ni dran pa yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response is ‚ÄúMemory too.‚Äù

original: de kho na ltar zhes bya ba ni mthong ba nyid las ma 'das par ro //
analyzed: de kho na ltar zhes bya ba ni mthong ba nyid las ma 'das par ro //
translated: ‚ÄúJust like that‚Äù means that it does not go beyond what is seen.

original: 'dir zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyis brjod pa ni'o //
analyzed: 'dir zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyis brjod pa ni'o //
translated: ‚ÄúHere‚Äù means in the opponent‚Äôs statement.

original: re re po nyid la ni sdong gru nyid dang skyes bu nyid sngar rim gyis mthong ba la /
analyzed: re re po nyid la ni sdong gru nyid dang skyes bu nyid sngar rim gyis mthong ba la /
translated: In each case, the boat and the person are seen gradually.

original: 'dir ni da ltar gnyi ga mi mthong ba des na the tshom za ba ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'dir ni da ltar gnyi ga mi mthong ba des na the tshom za ba ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Here, since both are not seen now, it is not doubted.

original: grub pa'i mtha' ni 'o na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha' ni 'o na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The conclusion is ‚ÄúWell then.‚Äù

original: gal te khyod kyi ni lugs la yang /
analyzed: gal te khyod kyi ni lugs la yang /
translated: If in your system,

original: mthong ba dang ma mthong ba la yang the tshom du mi 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i nyes par ji ltar zer ba'i phyir ji ltar nyes par mi 'gyur zhes dogs pa la /
analyzed: mthong ba dang ma mthong ba la yang the tshom du mi 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i nyes par ji ltar zer ba'i phyir ji ltar nyes par mi 'gyur zhes dogs pa la /
translated: why is it not the case that doubt arises with respect to what is seen and what is not seen?

original: bag chags las dmigs pa med pa'i shes pa res 'ga' skye ba ni the tshom gyi rgyu yin no zhes brjod pa ni de'i phyir zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: bag chags las dmigs pa med pa'i shes pa res 'ga' skye ba ni the tshom gyi rgyu yin no zhes brjod pa ni de'i phyir zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The cause of doubt is the occasional arising of a cognition that is not an object due to latent impressions.

original: dngos po'i rang bzhin ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po'i rang bzhin ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the nature of things is not seen.

original: shes pa ni 'di 'brang ba yin no zhes bya bar nges pa'o //
analyzed: shes pa ni 'di 'brang ba yin no zhes bya bar nges pa'o //
translated: It is certain that cognition is like this.

original: the tshom ni sdong gru 'am skyes bu zhes bya ba de lta bu'i rang bzhin can no //
analyzed: the tshom ni sdong gru 'am skyes bu zhes bya ba de lta bu'i rang bzhin can no //
translated: Doubt has the nature of a raft or a person.

original: gal te @85b spyi'i shes pa dmigs pa med pa nyid la yang the tshom gyi shes pa ni dmigs pa dang bcas pa nyid ma yin nam zhes dogs pa bsu ba ni ci ste zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te @85b spyi'i shes pa dmigs pa med pa nyid la yang the tshom gyi shes pa ni dmigs pa dang bcas pa nyid ma yin nam zhes dogs pa bsu ba ni ci ste zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If the cognition of a universal is indeed without an object, isn't the doubting cognition also without an object?

original: the tshom zhes bya ba ni the tshom gyi yul yin pa ni de lta bur gyur pa ni gnyi ga'i rnam par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: the tshom zhes bya ba ni the tshom gyi yul yin pa ni de lta bur gyur pa ni gnyi ga'i rnam par gyur pa'o //
translated: The doubt is the object of doubt. Such a thing is a combination of both.

original: ma yin te zhes bya ba ni dgag pa'o //
analyzed: ma yin te zhes bya ba ni dgag pa'o //
translated: No, it is a negation.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: don du mos zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: don du mos zhes gsungs so //
translated: It is said that it is due to the object.

original: mi slu ba dang bcas pa don du mos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi slu ba dang bcas pa don du mos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not the case that one is not devoted to the object that is non-deceptive.

original: 'o na de la mos pa ci 'dra ba bzhin yod snyam na 'di ni zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: 'o na de la mos pa ci 'dra ba bzhin yod snyam na 'di ni zhes gsungs so //
translated: If one were to think that it exists just as it is devoted to, he says, ‚Äúthis is not so.‚Äù

original: 'o na ji ltar 'jig rten yin pa the tshom gyi don yin par 'gyur ro snyam na /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar 'jig rten yin pa the tshom gyi don yin par 'gyur ro snyam na /
translated: If one were to think that how can the object of doubt be the world,

original: 'jig rten pa ma yin pa nyid khas len na shes pa nyid du khas blangs par 'gyur ro zhes brjod zin la /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa ma yin pa nyid khas len na shes pa nyid du khas blangs par 'gyur ro zhes brjod zin la /
translated: he says, ‚Äúif one does not accept that it is worldly, one accepts that it is knowledge.‚Äù

original: de lta na yang dmigs pa med pa nyid du grub po zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de lta na yang dmigs pa med pa nyid du grub po zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: And the meaning of this is that even so, the non-existence of the object is established.

original: 'di'i phyir zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di'i phyir zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúFor this reason‚Äù means: because of the non-existence of the object.

original: snang ba med pas zhes bya ba ni khyad par gnyi ga gsal ba med pas so //
analyzed: snang ba med pas zhes bya ba ni khyad par gnyi ga gsal ba med pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúBecause of the non-appearance‚Äù means: because of the non-manifestation of both the object and the subject.

original: ma mthong ba nyid 'ga' zhig la the tshom za ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ma mthong ba nyid 'ga' zhig la the tshom za ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the non-perception itself is doubted in some cases.

original: gzhan ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni de snang ba las ni ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni de snang ba las ni ma yin pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúNot otherwise‚Äù means: not from the appearance of that.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar dngos po'i yul nyid la the tshom mi srid pa des na'o //üîΩrjes su dpag pa'i yul dngos po nyid yin par dogs pa bsu ba ni 'on te re zhig ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar dngos po'i yul nyid la the tshom mi srid pa des na'o // rjes su dpag pa'i yul dngos po nyid yin par dogs pa bsu ba ni 'on te re zhig ces bya ba'o //
translated: because in this way, doubt is impossible with regard to the object, the entity.üîΩAnticipating an objection that the object of inference is an entity, he says, ‚ÄúBut if, on the one hand, inference is a means of valid cognition, then it must be unmistaken, like perception.‚Äù

original: gal te rjes su dpag pa dngos po rang bzhin 'dzin pa yin pa mngon sum bzhin du rnam pa bzhin du rtogs pa na yang mi g-yo bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te rjes su dpag pa dngos po rang bzhin 'dzin pa yin pa mngon sum bzhin du rnam pa bzhin du rtogs pa na yang mi g-yo bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If inference apprehends an entity, like perception, then it would be unmistaken.

original: sngar gyi rtogs pa'i rgyun g-yo ba ma yin la /
analyzed: sngar gyi rtogs pa'i rgyun g-yo ba ma yin la /
translated: The continuum of the previous cognition is not moving.

original: rgyun gzhan dag kyang 'dod pas 'jug pa yin no zhes brjod pa ni 'di la brjod pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rgyun gzhan dag kyang 'dod pas 'jug pa yin no zhes brjod pa ni 'di la brjod pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The other continuum is also asserted to be engaged. This is what is said.

original: der ni rjes su dpag pa la'o //
analyzed: der ni rjes su dpag pa la'o //
translated: There, in inference.

original: mngon sum yang der yang g-yo ba nyid mtshungs so //
analyzed: mngon sum yang der yang g-yo ba nyid mtshungs so //
translated: Perception is also similar in that it moves there.

original: de med pa'i phyir ni g-yo ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de med pa'i phyir ni g-yo ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it does not exist, because it does not move.

original: rnam par rtog pa yod pa na yang rgyu yod na rang gi ngo bo 'dzin pa ldog pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa yod pa na yang rgyu yod na rang gi ngo bo 'dzin pa ldog pa yin no //
translated: When there is conceptualization, if the cause exists, the apprehension of its own nature ceases.

original: rgyu med pa'i phyir ma skyes pa ni rjes su dpag pa la yang mtshungs so zhes dogs pa bsu ba ni /
analyzed: rgyu med pa'i phyir ma skyes pa ni rjes su dpag pa la yang mtshungs so zhes dogs pa bsu ba ni /
translated: The reply to the objection that the non-arisen is the same in inference is:

original: rjes su dpag pa la yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa la yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúEven in inference.‚Äù

original: ma yin te zhes bya ba ni btags pa med pa mes ma skyes pa na'o //
analyzed: ma yin te zhes bya ba ni btags pa med pa mes ma skyes pa na'o //
translated: ‚ÄúNo‚Äù means that the non-existent is not produced by fire.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na de ni zhes smos te /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na de ni zhes smos te /
translated: Why? He says, ‚ÄúThat‚Äù

original: rjes su dpag pa'o //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa'o //
translated: means inference.

original: g-yo bar mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba mes ma skyes pa 'brel to //
analyzed: g-yo bar mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba mes ma skyes pa 'brel to //
translated: ‚ÄúBecause movement is seen‚Äù is connected to ‚Äúthe non-produced by fire.‚Äù

original: gzhan du zhes bya ba mes ma skyes pa nyid du dogs @86a * //
analyzed: gzhan du zhes bya ba mes ma skyes pa nyid du dogs @86a * //
translated: ‚ÄúOtherwise‚Äù means doubting the non-produced by fire.

original: so ; / gal te gzhan du dogs pa na rtag pa rgyu nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: so ; / gal te gzhan du dogs pa na rtag pa rgyu nyid ma yin te /
translated: If doubting otherwise, the permanent is not the cause itself.

original: rtags kyi byed pa ni med na mi 'byung bar nges pa kho na yin no zhes dogs pa bsu ba ni 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rtags kyi byed pa ni med na mi 'byung bar nges pa kho na yin no zhes dogs pa bsu ba ni 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The function of the reason is only the ascertainment of the invariable concomitance. The reply to the objection is: ‚ÄúIf‚Äù

original: rjes su dpag pas dngos po'i rang bzhin mthong ba ni med na mi 'byung ba yang nges pa kho na'o zhes 'don pa de ni mi 'thad de zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pas dngos po'i rang bzhin mthong ba ni med na mi 'byung ba yang nges pa kho na'o zhes 'don pa de ni mi 'thad de zhes bya ba'o //
translated: means that the seen nature of things by inference is only the ascertained invariable concomitance. That reading is not tenable. He says,üîΩ‚ÄúNo.‚Äù

original: de zhes bya ba dngos po'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba dngos po'i rang bzhin no //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the nature of entities.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar dngos po 'dzin pa yin na mi g-yo ba de'i phyir de las zhes bya ba ni rjes su dpag pa las so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar dngos po 'dzin pa yin na mi g-yo ba de'i phyir de las zhes bya ba ni rjes su dpag pa las so //
translated: Because it is like that, it is a grasping of entities, and it is unmoving. Therefore, ‚Äúfrom that‚Äù means from inference.

original: ci ste dngos po 'dzin pa yin yang gzhan gyi nye bar bstan pa las g-yo bar 'gyur snyam du dogs na /
analyzed: ci ste dngos po 'dzin pa yin yang gzhan gyi nye bar bstan pa las g-yo bar 'gyur snyam du dogs na /
translated: If it is thought that even though it is a grasping of entities, it moves from the teaching of another,

original: mthong ba nyid ni zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: mthong ba nyid ni zhes gsungs so //
translated: he says, ‚ÄúSeeing itself . . .‚Äù

original: rjes su dpag pa'i shes pa'o //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa'i shes pa'o //
translated: Inference is knowledge.

original: mthong ba nyid g-yo ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ste gang du grub snyam na /
analyzed: mthong ba nyid g-yo ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ste gang du grub snyam na /
translated: ‚ÄúSeeing itself does not move,‚Äù but where is that established?

original: dpe gsungs pa ni mngon sum la ni zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: dpe gsungs pa ni mngon sum la ni zhes gsungs te /
translated: He states an example: ‚ÄúIn direct perception . . .‚Äù

original: rang gi rang bzhin 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid can la'o //
analyzed: rang gi rang bzhin 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid can la'o //
translated: It is in regard to that which has the nature of grasping its own nature.

original: gal te thag ring po nas mthong ba ni 'di ni me ma yin no zhes bya bar g-yo ba med pa nyid ma yin nam zhes dogs pa bsu ba nas /
analyzed: gal te thag ring po nas mthong ba ni 'di ni me ma yin no zhes bya bar g-yo ba med pa nyid ma yin nam zhes dogs pa bsu ba nas /
translated: If it is asked, ‚ÄúIs it not the case that when something is seen from a distance, it is not ascertained that ‚Äòthis is fire‚Äô?‚Äù

original: g-yo ba yin na zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: g-yo ba yin na zhes gsungs so //
translated: He says, ‚ÄúIf it moves . . .‚Äù

original: g-yo ba ni reg bya la sogs pa yin na /
analyzed: g-yo ba ni reg bya la sogs pa yin na /
translated: If it moves, it is a tangible object, etc.

original: de la ni mthong ba yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de la ni mthong ba yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it does not exist in seeing.

original: mngon sum la ni g-yo ba med //
analyzed: mngon sum la ni g-yo ba med //

original: ces bya ba de nyid 'chad pa ni mthong ba'i don gang yin pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba de nyid 'chad pa ni mthong ba'i don gang yin pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: He explains just that: ‚ÄúThe object of seeing . . .‚Äù

original: g-yo ba yin zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: g-yo ba yin zhes bya ba ste /
translated: ‚ÄúMovement‚Äù means

original: 'chad pa ni ci ste yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'chad pa ni ci ste yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIf it is said . . .‚Äù

original: mthong ba yin zhes bya ba de ni rnam par 'brel pa na lan 'debs par ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mthong ba yin zhes bya ba de ni rnam par 'brel pa na lan 'debs par ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúSeeing‚Äù means ‚Äúif it is said that it is related . . .‚Äù

original: ci'i phyir snyam na mig gis reg pa zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: ci'i phyir snyam na mig gis reg pa zhes gsungs so //
translated: Why? He says, ‚Äúbecause of contact with the eye.‚Äù

original: 'byung bar 'gyur ba yang mngon sum gyi yul ma ma yin no zhes bshad pa ni /
analyzed: 'byung bar 'gyur ba yang mngon sum gyi yul ma ma yin no zhes bshad pa ni /
translated: He explains that what will arise is also not an object of direct perception:

original: 'byung 'gyur rang bzhin zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'byung 'gyur rang bzhin zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe nature of what will arise . . .‚Äù

original: des na rang gi ngo bo ma mthong ba nyid g-yo ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: des na rang gi ngo bo ma mthong ba nyid g-yo ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Therefore, the meaning is that what is not seen in its own nature is movement.

original: 'di nyid bsgrub pa'i don du rnam par rtog par byed pa ni ci 'di zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid bsgrub pa'i don du rnam par rtog par byed pa ni ci 'di zhes bya ba'o //
translated: In order to establish this, he imagines, ‚ÄúWhat is this?‚Äù

original: dang po sel ba ni 'di zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dang po sel ba ni 'di zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The first refutation is ‚ÄúWhat is this?‚Äù

original: gnyis pa sel ba ni 'on te gzugs zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa sel ba ni 'on te gzugs zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The second is the exclusion: ‚ÄúBut it is called form.‚Äù

original: de zhes bya ba ni tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni tshogs pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú That‚Äù refers to the collection.

original: des na zhes bya ba ni ma bzung ba na'o //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni ma bzung ba na'o //
translated: ‚Äú Then‚Äù refers to when it is not apprehended.

original: ma mthong ba kho na'o zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa'i tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: ma mthong ba kho na'o zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa'i tshogs pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú It is not seen at all‚Äù refers to the collection of form, etc.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚Äú Therefore‚Äù refers to because it is seen.

original: ma mthong ba kho na'o zhes bya ba ni snang bzhin pa nyid la ni g-yo ba yod ba ma @86b yin te /
analyzed: ma mthong ba kho na'o zhes bya ba ni snang bzhin pa nyid la ni g-yo ba yod ba ma @86b yin te /
translated: ‚Äú It is not seen at all‚Äù means that there is no movement in what is actually appearing,

original: mngon sum dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mngon sum dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: because that contradicts direct perception.

original: gsum pa la yang 'di nyid sbyor bar byed pa ni gang gi phyir mthong ba g-yo ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsum pa la yang 'di nyid sbyor bar byed pa ni gang gi phyir mthong ba g-yo ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The same argument is applied to the third: because what is seen does not move.

original: rnam par rtog pa zhes bya ba ni rtsa ba las byung ba 'am lo ma las byung ba zhes bya ba de lta bu rang bzhin gyi the tshom mo //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa zhes bya ba ni rtsa ba las byung ba 'am lo ma las byung ba zhes bya ba de lta bu rang bzhin gyi the tshom mo //
translated: ‚Äú Conceptualization‚Äù is doubt about the nature of something, such as whether it is root-born or leaf-born.

original: the tshom yang yod de des na'o //
analyzed: the tshom yang yod de des na'o //
translated: There is also doubt, and because of thatüîΩ.

original: mthong ba la yang g-yo ba yod par dogs pa bsu ba ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mthong ba la yang g-yo ba yod par dogs pa bsu ba ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The possibility of movement in what is seen is anticipated in the phrase ‚Äúif it is thought.üîΩ‚Äù

original: rnam pa gzhan gyi zhes bya ba ni skad cig nyid dam thag ring nas khyad par la'o //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan gyi zhes bya ba ni skad cig nyid dam thag ring nas khyad par la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIn another way‚Äù refers to momentariness or to a distant place.

original: dpag bya la zhes bya ba ni mngon sum gyi ma nges pa'i skad cig ma nyid ni rjes su dpag pas nges pa kho nas yin la /
analyzed: dpag bya la zhes bya ba ni mngon sum gyi ma nges pa'i skad cig ma nyid ni rjes su dpag pas nges pa kho nas yin la /
translated: ‚ÄúIn what is to be inferred‚Äù means that momentariness, which is not ascertained by perception, is ascertained only by inference.

original: thag ring po nas khyad par gyi cha ma mthong ba la yang ngo //
analyzed: thag ring po nas khyad par gyi cha ma mthong ba la yang ngo //
translated: And it is also the case that the aspect of a distant place is not seen.

original: 'og gi cha la sogs pa 'ga' zhig ni mthong ba yin yang rjes su dpag pa kho nas yin te /
analyzed: 'og gi cha la sogs pa 'ga' zhig ni mthong ba yin yang rjes su dpag pa kho nas yin te /

original: dngos po ni du ma nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po ni du ma nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the thing is manifold.

original: gal te mthong ba dang rjes su dpag par bya ba dag tha mi dad pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: gal te mthong ba dang rjes su dpag par bya ba dag tha mi dad pa'i phyir na /
